                  # Work out what part to return
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

                  file_size = File.size(prompt_path)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                  begin_point = 0
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                  end_point = file_size - 1
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                  # Was it asked for just a part of the file?
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                  if request.headers['Range']
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                    # indicate partial content
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                    status 206
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                    # extract part desired from the content
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                    if request.headers['Range'] =~ /bytes\=(\d+)\-(\d*)/
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                      begin_point = Regexp.last_match(1).to_i
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                      end_point = Regexp.last_match(2).to_i if Regexp.last_match(2).present?

    96. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                    end_point = file_size - 1 unless end_point < file_size - 1
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                  # Return the requested content
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                  content_length = end_point - begin_point + 1
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

                  header['Content-Range'] = "bytes #{begin_point}-#{end_point}/#{file_size}"
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                  header['Content-Length'] = content_length.to_s
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                  header['Accept-Ranges'] = 'bytes'
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

                  # Read the binary data and return
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108.

                  result

              post '/projects/:project_id/task_def_id/:task_definition_id/comments/:task_comment_id/discussion_comment/reply' do
          
      180.

                project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
          
      181.

                task_definition = project.unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_definition_id])
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                task = project.task_for_task_definition(task_definition)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, task, :make_discussion_reply
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to reply to this discussion comment' }, 403)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                attached_file = params[:attachment]
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                if attached_file.present?
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                  error!(error: 'Attachment is empty.') unless File.size?(attached_file["tempfile"].path).present?
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                  error!(error: 'Attachment exceeds the maximum attachment size of 30MB.') unless File.size?(attached_file["tempfile"].path) < 30_000_000
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                logger.info("#{current_user.username} - added a reply to the discussion comment #{params[:task_comment_id]} for task #{task.id} (#{task_definition.abbreviation})")
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                if attached_file.nil? || attached_file.empty?
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Discussion reply is empty, unable to add new reply to discussion comment' }, 403)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                discussion_comment = task.all_comments.find(params[:task_comment_id])
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                # discussion_comment.mark_discussion_completed
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                # mark comment read for student
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                discussion_comment.mark_as_read(current_user, project.unit)
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                error!({ error: 'No discussion comment found for the given task' }, 403) if discussion_comment.nil?
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

                result = discussion_comment.add_reply(attached_file)
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

                nil
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

            end

                expose :learning_outcomes, using: LearningOutcomeEntity, as: :ilos, unless: :summary_only
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                expose :tutorial_streams, using: TutorialStreamEntity, unless: :summary_only
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                expose :tutorials, using: TutorialEntity, unless: :summary_only
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                expose :tutorial_enrolments, using: TutorialEnrolmentEntity, unless: :summary_only, if: lambda { |unit, options|  is_staff?(options[:user], unit) }
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

            
          
      46.

                expose :task_definitions, using: TaskDefinitionEntity, unless: :summary_only

            class ExtensionCommentsApi < Grape::API
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthenticationHelpers
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthorisationHelpers

    6. 
            
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Request an extension for a task'
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

                requires :comment, type: String, desc: 'The details of the request'
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

                requires :weeks_requested, type: Integer, desc: 'The details of the request'
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

              post '/projects/:project_id/task_def_id/:task_definition_id/request_extension' do
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                task_definition = project.unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_definition_id])
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                task = project.task_for_task_definition(task_definition)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                # check permissions using specific permission has with addition of request extension if allowed in unit
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, task, :request_extension, ->(role, perm_hash, other) { task.specific_permission_hash(role, perm_hash, other) }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to request an extension for this task' }, 403)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                error!({error:'Extension weeks can not be 0.'}, 403) if params[:weeks_requested] == 0
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                max_duration = task.weeks_can_extend
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                duration = params[:weeks_requested]
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                duration = max_duration unless params[:weeks_requested] <= max_duration
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                error!({error:'Extensions cannot be granted beyond task deadline.'}, 403) if duration <= 0
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                result = task.apply_for_extension(current_user, params[:comment], duration)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                present result.serialize(current_user), Grape::Presenters::Presenter
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

            
          
      34.

              put '/projects/:project_id/task_def_id/:task_definition_id/assess_extension/:task_comment_id' do

    48. 
            
            

            

            
          
      49.

                  if task_comment.errors.count >= 1
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                    error!({error: task_comment.errors.full_messages.first}, 403)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53.

      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                present task_comment.serialize(current_user), Grape::Presenters::Presenter
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

            end

            class GroupSetsApi < Grape::API

              desc 'Add a new group set to the given unit'

              post '/units/:unit_id/group_sets' do

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :update

      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36.

                logger.info "Create group set: #{current_user.username} in #{unit.code} from #{request.ip}"
          
      38.

                group_params = ActionController::Parameters.new(params)
          
      40.

                                                            .require(:group_set)
