                unit.learning_outcomes.find(params[:learning_outcome_id])
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                task_def = unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_definition_id])
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

                link_parameters = ActionController::Parameters.new(params)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

                                                              .permit(
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                                                                :task_definition_id,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

                                                                :learning_outcome_id,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                                                                :description,
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                                                                :rating
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                                                              )
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                unless params[:project_id].nil?
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                  project = unit.projects.find(params[:project_id])
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                  task = project.task_for_task_definition(task_def)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

                  unless authorise?(current_user, task, :make_submission)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

                    error!({ error: 'You are not authorised to create outcome alignments for this task.' }, 403)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

                  link_parameters[:task_id] = task.id
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                result = LearningOutcomeTaskLink.create! link_parameters
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                present result, with: Entities::TaskOutcomeAlignmentEntity
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Update the alignment between a task and unit outcome'
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                requires :id, type: Integer, desc: 'The id of the task alignment'
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

                requires :unit_id, type: Integer, desc: 'The id of the unit'
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                optional :description, type: String, desc: 'The description of the alignment'
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                optional :rating, type: Integer, desc: 'The rating for this link, indicating the strength of this alignment'
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

              put '/units/:unit_id/learning_alignments/:id' do
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                align = unit.learning_outcome_task_links.find(params[:id])
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                link_parameters = ActionController::Parameters.new(params)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                                                              .permit(
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                                                                :description,
          
      161.

    162. 
            
            

            

                                                              )
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                # is this a project task alignment update?
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                if !align.task_id.nil?
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

                  task = align.task
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                  unless authorise?(current_user, task, :make_submission)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                    error!({ error: 'You are not authorised to update outcome alignments for this task.' }, 403)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                # else, this is a unit alignment update!
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                elsif !authorise?(current_user, unit, :update)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'You are not authorised to update the task alignments in this unit.' }, 403)
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

            
          
      177.

                align.update(link_parameters)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                align.save!
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179.

      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      181.

              before do

                authenticated?

    10.

              desc 'Add an outcome to a unit'
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                requires :unit_id, type: Integer, desc: 'The unit ID for which the ILO belongs to'
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                requires :name, type: String, desc: 'The ILO''s name'
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                requires :description, type: String, desc: 'The ILO''s description'
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                optional :abbreviation, type: String, desc: 'The ILO''s new abbreviation'
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

              post '/units/:unit_id/outcomes' do
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :update
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'You are not authorised to create outcomes in this unit.' }, 403)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                end

    27.

      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      29.

      30.

      32.

                optional :name, type: String, desc: 'The ILO''s new name'
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34.

                error!({ error: 'Unable to locate requested unit.' }, 405) if unit.nil?

                                                              .permit(

      59.

              desc 'Upload the outcomes for a unit from a csv'

            require 'grape'

            class ProjectsApi < Grape::API
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthenticationHelpers
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthorisationHelpers
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

              helpers DbHelpers
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

              before do
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

                authenticated?

    10.

    12. 
            
            

            

              desc "Fetches all of the current user's projects"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                optional :include_inactive, type: Boolean, desc: 'Include projects for units that are no longer active?'
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

              get '/projects' do
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                include_inactive = params[:include_inactive] || false
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                projects = Project.for_user current_user, include_inactive
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                student_name = db_concat('users.first_name', "' '", 'users.last_name')
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                # join in other tables to fetch data
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                data = projects.
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                            joins(:unit).
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                            joins(:user).
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                            select( 'projects.*',
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                                    'units.name AS unit_name', 'units.id AS unit_id', 'units.code AS unit_code', 'units.start_date AS start_date', 'units.end_date AS end_date', 'units.teaching_period_id AS teaching_period_id', 'units.active AS active',
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                                    "#{student_name} AS student_name"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                                  )
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                # Now map the data to structure for json to return
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                result = data.map do |row|
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                  {
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                    unit_id: row['unit_id'],
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                    unit_code: row['unit_code'],
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                    unit_name: row['unit_name'],
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                    project_id: row['id'],
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                    campus_id: row['campus_id'],
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                    target_grade: row['target_grade'],
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                    has_portfolio: !row['portfolio_production_date'].nil?,
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                    start_date: row['start_date'].strftime('%Y-%m-%d'),
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                    end_date: row['end_date'].strftime('%Y-%m-%d'),
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                    teaching_period_id: row['teaching_period_id'],
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                    active: row['active'].is_a?(Numeric) ? row['active'] != 0 : row['active']
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                  }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                present result, with: Grape::Presenters::Presenter
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Get project'
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

              params do

      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

              get '/projects/:id' do
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                project = Project.find(params[:id])
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

                if authorise? current_user, project, :get
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                  project
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Couldn't find Project with id=#{params[:id]}" }, 403)

    63. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      64.

              desc 'Update a project'

                optional :trigger,            type: String,  desc: 'The update trigger'

              put '/projects/:id' do
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

                project = Project.find(params[:id])
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

                if params[:trigger].nil? == false
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                  if params[:trigger] == 'trigger_week_end'
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                    if authorise? current_user, project, :trigger_week_end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                      project.trigger_week_end(current_user)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                      error!({ error: "You are not authorised to perform this action for Project with id=#{params[:id]}" }, 403)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

                    error!({ error: "Invalid trigger - #{params[:trigger]} unknown" }, 403)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                # If we are only updating the campus
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                elsif params[:campus_id].present?
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                  unless authorise? current_user, project, :change_campus
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                    error!({ error: "You cannot change the campus for project #{params[:id]}" }, 403)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                  project.campus_id = params[:campus_id] == -1 ? nil : params[:campus_id]

    99. 
            
            

            

                  project.save!

                elsif !params[:grade].nil?

                  if params[:grade_rationale].nil?

    131.

                  if params[:old_grade].nil?
          
      133.

                    error!({ error: 'Existing project grade is required to perform assessment.' }, 403)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

            
          
      136.

                  if params[:old_grade] != project.grade
          
      137.

                    error!({ error: 'Existing project grade does not match current grade. Refresh project and try again.' }, 403)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                  end

    139.

                  project.save!
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                  present project, Entities::ProjectEntity, for_staff: true
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                  return
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                elsif !params[:compile_portfolio].nil?
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                  unless authorise? current_user, project, :change
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148.

      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150.

                  project.compile_portfolio = params[:compile_portfolio]

      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                Entities::ProjectEntity.represent(project, only: [ :campus_id, :enrolled, :target_grade, :submitted_grade, :compile_portfolio, :portfolio_available, :uses_draft_learning_summary, :stats, :burndown_chart_data ])
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

              end # put
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Enrol a student in a unit, creating them a project'
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                requires :unit_id, type: Integer, desc: 'Unit Id'
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                requires :student_num, type: String,   desc: 'Student Number 7 digit code'
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                requires :campus_id, type: Integer, desc: 'Campus this project is part of'
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

              post '/projects' do
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

                student = User.find_by(username: params[:student_num])
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                student = User.find_by(student_id: params[:student_num]) if student.nil?
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                student = User.find_by(email: params[:student_num]) if student.nil?
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                if student.nil?
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Couldn't find Student with username=#{params[:student_num]}" }, 403)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                campus = Campus.find(params[:campus_id])
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                if authorise? current_user, unit, :enrol_student
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                  proj = unit.enrol_student(student, campus)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                  if proj.nil?
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                    error!({ error: 'Error adding student to unit' }, 403)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                    result = {
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                      project_id: proj.id,
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                      enrolled: proj.enrolled,
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                      first_name: proj.student.first_name,
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                      last_name: proj.student.last_name,
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

                      student_id: proj.student.username,
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                      student_email: proj.student.email,
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                      target_grade: proj.target_grade,
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                      campus_id: proj.campus_id,
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                      compile_portfolio: false,
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191.

            module Submission::GenerateHelpers

              def scoop_files(params, upload_reqs)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

                files = params.reject { |key| !(key =~ /^file\d+$/) }
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

                error!({ error: 'Upload requirements mismatch with files provided' }, 403) if files.length != upload_reqs.length
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                # Pair the name and type from upload_requirements to each file
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                upload_reqs.each do |detail|
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                  key = detail['key']
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                  next unless files.key? key
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                  files[key][:id]   = files[key]['name']
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                  files[key][:name] = detail['name']
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                  files[key][:type] = detail['type']
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                # File didn't get assigned an id above, then reject it since there was a mismatch
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                files = files.reject { |_key, file| file[:id].nil? }
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                error!({ error: 'Upload requirements mismatch with files provided' }, 403) if files.length != upload_reqs.length
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                # Kill the kvp
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                files.map { |_k, v| v }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30.

      28.

      29.

      32.

    0.0% lines covered

    139 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 139 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            
            

            

            require 'grape'
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

            class TaskCommentsApi < Grape::API
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthenticationHelpers
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthorisationHelpers
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

              before do
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                authenticated?
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Add a new comment to a task'
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                optional :comment, type: String, desc: 'The comment text to add to the task'
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                optional :attachment, type: File, desc: 'Image, sound, PDF or video comment file'
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                optional :reply_to_id, type: Integer, desc: 'The comment to which this comment is replying'
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

              post '/projects/:project_id/task_def_id/:task_definition_id/comments' do
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                task_definition = project.unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_definition_id])
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, project, :make_submission
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to create a comment for this task' }, 403)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                text_comment = params[:comment]
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                attached_file = params[:attachment]
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                reply_to_id = params[:reply_to_id]
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                if attached_file.present?
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                  error!({error: "Attachment is empty."}) unless File.size?(attached_file["tempfile"].path).present?
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                  error!({error: "Attachment exceeds the maximum attachment size of 30MB."}) unless File.size?(attached_file["tempfile"].path) < 30_000_000
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                task = project.task_for_task_definition(task_definition)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                type_string = content_type.to_s
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                if reply_to_id.present?
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                  originalTaskComment = TaskComment.find(reply_to_id)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                  error!(error: 'You do not have permission to read the replied comment') unless authorise?(current_user, originalTaskComment.project, :get) || (task.group_task? && task.group.role_for(current_user) != nil)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                  error!(error: 'Original comment is not in this task.') unless task.all_comments.find(reply_to_id).present?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                logger.info("#{current_user.username} - added comment for task #{task.id} (#{task_definition.abbreviation})")
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                if attached_file.nil? || attached_file.empty?
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Comment text is empty, unable to add new comment' }, 403) unless text_comment.present?
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                  result = task.add_text_comment(current_user, text_comment, reply_to_id)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                  unless FileHelper.accept_file(attached_file, 'comment attachment - TaskComment', 'comment_attachment')
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                    error!({ error: 'Please upload only images, audio or PDF documents' }, 403)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                  result = task.add_comment_with_attachment(current_user, attached_file, reply_to_id)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                if result.nil?
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'No comment added. Comment duplicates last comment, so ignored.' }, 403)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

                  present result, with: Entities::CommentEntity, current_user: current_user
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Get an attachment related to a task comment'
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

                optional :as_attachment, type: Boolean, desc: 'Whether or not to download file as attachment. Default is false.'
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

              get '/projects/:project_id/task_def_id/:task_definition_id/comments/:id' do
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

                project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

                task_definition = project.unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_definition_id])
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, project, :get
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'You cannot read the comments for this task' }, 403)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                if project.has_task_for_task_definition? task_definition
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

                  task = project.task_for_task_definition(task_definition)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                  comment = task.comments.find(params[:id])
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'No attachment for this comment.' }, 404) unless %w(audio image pdf).include? comment.content_type
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'File missing' }, 404) unless File.exist? comment.attachment_path
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                  # Set return content type
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                  content_type comment.attachment_mime_type
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                  env['api.format'] = :binary
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                  # mark as attachment
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                  if params[:as_attachment]
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

                    header['Content-Disposition'] = "attachment; filename=#{comment.attachment_file_name}"
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                  # Work out what part to return
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                  file_size = File.size(comment.attachment_path)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                  begin_point = 0
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                  end_point = file_size - 1
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                  # Was it asked for just a part of the file?
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                  if request.headers['Range']
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                    # indicate partial content
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                    status 206
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                    # extract part desired from the content
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                    if request.headers['Range'] =~ /bytes\=(\d+)\-(\d*)/
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

                      begin_point = Regexp.last_match(1).to_i
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

                      end_point = Regexp.last_match(2).to_i if Regexp.last_match(2).present?
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

                    end_point = file_size - 1 unless end_point < file_size - 1
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

                  # Return the requested content
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

                  content_length = end_point - begin_point + 1
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

                  header['Content-Range'] = "bytes #{begin_point}-#{end_point}/#{file_size}"
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

                  header['Content-Length'] = content_length.to_s
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

                  header['Accept-Ranges'] = 'bytes'
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

                  # Read the binary data and return
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                  IO.binread(comment.attachment_path, content_length, begin_point)
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Get the comments related to a task'
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

              get '/projects/:project_id/task_def_id/:task_definition_id/comments' do
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

                project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                task_definition = project.unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_definition_id])
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, project, :get
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'You cannot read the comments for this task' }, 403)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                if project.has_task_for_task_definition? task_definition
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                  task = project.task_for_task_definition(task_definition)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

                  comments = task.all_comments.order('created_at ASC')
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

                  result = task.comments_for_user(current_user)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                  result.each do |d| end # cache results...
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                  # mark every comment type except for DiscussionComments so we don't mark it as read.
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                  comments_to_mark_as_read = comments.where("TYPE is null OR TYPE != 'DiscussionComment'")
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                  task.mark_comments_as_read(current_user, comments_to_mark_as_read)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                  result = []
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                present result, with: Entities::CommentEntity, current_user: current_user
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Delete a comment'
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

              delete '/projects/:project_id/task_def_id/:task_definition_id/comments/:id' do
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                task_definition = project.unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_definition_id])
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, project, :get
          
      155.
