                  error!({ error: 'You cannot read the comments for this task' }, 403)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                task = project.task_for_task_definition(task_definition)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                task_comment = task.all_comments.find(params[:id])
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                key = if current_user == task_comment.user
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                        :delete_own_comment
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                        :delete_other_comment
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, task, key
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to delete this comment' }, 403)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                task_comment.destroy
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                present false
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Mark a comment as unread'
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

              post '/projects/:project_id/task_def_id/:task_definition_id/comments/:id' do
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                task_definition = project.unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_definition_id])
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, project, :make_submission
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to mark comment as unread' }, 403)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                task = project.task_for_task_definition(task_definition)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                task_comment = task.comments.find(params[:id])
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                task_comment.mark_as_unread(current_user)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                present task_comment, with: Entities::CommentEntity, current_user: current_user
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      193.

    app/api/task_definitions_api.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    455 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 455 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            
            

            

            require 'grape'
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

            class TaskDefinitionsApi < Grape::API
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthenticationHelpers
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthorisationHelpers
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

              helpers FileHelper
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

              helpers MimeCheckHelpers
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

              helpers Submission::GenerateHelpers
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

              before do
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

                authenticated?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Add a new task definition to the given unit'
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                requires :task_def, type: Hash do
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                  optional :tutorial_stream_abbr,     type: String,   desc: 'The abbreviation of tutorial stream'
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                  requires :name,                     type: String,   desc: 'The name of this task def'
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                  requires :description,              type: String,   desc: 'The description of this task def'
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                  requires :weighting,                type: Integer,  desc: 'The weighting of this task'
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                  requires :target_grade,             type: Integer,  desc: 'Minimum grade for task'
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                  optional :group_set_id,             type: Integer,  desc: 'Related group set'
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                  requires :start_date,               type: Date,     desc: 'The date when the task should be started'
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                  requires :target_date,              type: Date,     desc: 'The date when the task is due'
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                  optional :due_date,                 type: Date,     desc: 'The deadline date'
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                  requires :abbreviation,             type: String,   desc: 'The abbreviation of the task'
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                  requires :restrict_status_updates,  type: Boolean,  desc: 'Restrict updating of the status to staff'
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                  optional :upload_requirements,      type: String,   desc: 'Task file upload requirements'
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                  optional :plagiarism_checks,        type: String,   desc: 'The list of checks to perform'
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                  requires :plagiarism_warn_pct,      type: Integer,  desc: 'The percent at which to record and warn about plagiarism'
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                  requires :is_graded,                type: Boolean,  desc: 'Whether or not this task definition is a graded task'
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                  requires :max_quality_pts,          type: Integer,  desc: 'A range for quality points when quality is assessed'
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                  optional :assessment_enabled,       type: Boolean,  desc: 'Enable or disable assessment'
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                  optional :overseer_image_id,        type: Integer,  desc: 'The id of the Docker image for overseer'
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

              post '/units/:unit_id/task_definitions/' do
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :add_task_def
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to create a task definition of this unit' }, 403)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                params[:task_def][:upload_requirements] = '[]' if params[:task_def][:upload_requirements].nil?
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                task_params = ActionController::Parameters.new(params)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                                                          .require(:task_def)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                                                          .permit(
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                                                            :name,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                                                            :description,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                                                            :weighting,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                                                            :target_grade,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                                                            :start_date,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                                                            :target_date,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55.

      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                                                            :abbreviation,
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                                                            :restrict_status_updates,
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                                                            :upload_requirements,
          
      59.

                                                            :plagiarism_checks,
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                                                            :plagiarism_warn_pct,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                                                            :is_graded,
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

                                                            :max_quality_pts,
          
      63.

                                                            :assessment_enabled,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

                                                            :overseer_image_id
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

                                                          )
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

                task_params[:unit_id] = unit.id
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

                task_def = TaskDefinition.new(task_params)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

                # Set the tutorial stream
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_stream_abbr = params[:task_def][:tutorial_stream_abbr]
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                unless tutorial_stream_abbr.nil?
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial_stream = unit.tutorial_streams.find_by!(abbreviation: tutorial_stream_abbr)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                  task_def.tutorial_stream = tutorial_stream
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

                # Link in group set if specified
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

                if params[:task_def][:group_set_id] && params[:task_def][:group_set_id] >= 0
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

                  gs = GroupSet.find(params[:task_def][:group_set_id])
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

                  task_def.group_set = gs if gs.unit == unit
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                task_def.save!
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                present task_def, with: Entities::TaskDefinitionEntity
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Edits the given task definition'
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                requires :id, type: Integer, desc: 'The task id to edit'
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                requires :task_def, type: Hash do
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                  optional :tutorial_stream_abbr,     type: String,   desc: 'The abbreviation of the tutorial stream'
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                  optional :name,                     type: String,   desc: 'The name of this task def'
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                  optional :description,              type: String,   desc: 'The description of this task def'
          
      97.

                  optional :weighting,                type: Integer,  desc: 'The weighting of this task'
          
      98.

                  optional :target_grade,             type: Integer,  desc: 'Target grade for task'
          
      99.

                  optional :group_set_id,             type: Integer,  desc: 'Related group set'
          
      100.

                  optional :start_date,               type: Date,     desc: 'The date when the task should be started'
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                  optional :target_date,              type: Date,     desc: 'The date when the task is due'
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                  optional :due_date,                 type: Date,     desc: 'The deadline date'
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

                  optional :abbreviation,             type: String,   desc: 'The abbreviation of the task'
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                  optional :restrict_status_updates,  type: Boolean,  desc: 'Restrict updating of the status to staff'
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                  optional :upload_requirements,      type: String,   desc: 'Task file upload requirements'
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

                  optional :plagiarism_checks,        type: String,   desc: 'The list of checks to perform'
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

                  optional :plagiarism_warn_pct,      type: Integer,  desc: 'The percent at which to record and warn about plagiarism'
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

                  optional :is_graded,                type: Boolean,  desc: 'Whether or not this task definition is a graded task'
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

                  optional :max_quality_pts,          type: Integer,  desc: 'A range for quality points when quality is assessed'
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

                  optional :assessment_enabled,       type: Boolean,  desc: 'Enable or disable assessment'
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

                  optional :overseer_image_id,        type: Integer,  desc: 'The id of the Docker image name for overseer'
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

              put '/units/:unit_id/task_definitions/:id' do
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

                task_def = unit.task_definitions.find(params[:id])
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, task_def.unit, :add_task_def
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to create a task definition of this unit' }, 403)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                task_params = ActionController::Parameters.new(params)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

                                                          .require(:task_def)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

                                                          .permit(
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                                                            :name,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

                                                            :description,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                                                            :weighting,
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                                                            :target_grade,
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                                                            :start_date,
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                                                            :target_date,
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                                                            :due_date,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                                                            :abbreviation,
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                                                            :restrict_status_updates,
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                                                            :upload_requirements,
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

                                                            :plagiarism_checks,
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

                                                            :plagiarism_warn_pct,
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

                                                            :is_graded,
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                                                            :max_quality_pts,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

                                                            :assessment_enabled,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                                                            :overseer_image_id
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                                                          )
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                # Ensure changes to a TD defined as a "draft task definition" are validated
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                if unit.draft_task_definition_id == params[:id]
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                  if params[:task_def][:upload_requirements]
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                    requirements = JSON.parse(params[:task_def][:upload_requirements])
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                    if requirements.length != 1 || requirements[0]["type"] != "document"
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                      error!({ error: 'Task is marked as the draft learning summary task definition. A draft learning summary task can only contain a single document upload.' }, 403)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                task_def.update!(task_params)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                # Set the tutorial stream
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_stream_abbr = params[:task_def][:tutorial_stream_abbr]
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

                unless tutorial_stream_abbr.nil?
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial_stream = task_def.unit.tutorial_streams.find_by!(abbreviation: tutorial_stream_abbr)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                  task_def.tutorial_stream = tutorial_stream
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                  task_def.save!
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                # Link in group set if specified
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

                if params[:task_def][:group_set_id]
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                  if params[:task_def][:group_set_id] >= 0
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                    gs = GroupSet.find(params[:task_def][:group_set_id])
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                    if gs.unit == task_def.unit
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                      task_def.group_set = gs
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                      task_def.save!
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                    task_def.group_set = nil
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                    task_def.save!
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                present task_def, with: Entities::TaskDefinitionEntity
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Upload CSV of task definitions to the provided unit'
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                requires :file, type: File, desc: 'CSV upload file.'
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                requires :unit_id, type: Integer, desc: 'The unit to upload tasks to'
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

              post '/csv/task_definitions' do
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :upload_csv
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to upload CSV of tasks' }, 403)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                unless params[:file].present?
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "No file uploaded" }, 403)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                path = params[:file][:tempfile].path
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

                # check mime is correct before uploading
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                ensure_csv!(path)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                # Actually import...
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                unit.import_tasks_from_csv(File.new(path))
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

            
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Download CSV of all task definitions for the given unit'
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      209.

      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])

                content_type 'application/octet-stream'

            require 'grape'

            class TasksApi < Grape::API
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthenticationHelpers
          
      5.

              helpers AuthorisationHelpers
          
      6.

      7.

              before do

                authenticated?

      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

              # Tasks only used for the task summary stats view...
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

              desc "Get all the current user's tasks"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                requires :unit_id, type: Integer, desc: 'Unit to fetch the task details for'
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

              get '/tasks' do
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :get_students
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'You do not have permission to read these task details' }, 403)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                result = unit.student_tasks.
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                    joins(:task_status).
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                    joins('LEFT OUTER JOIN tutorial_enrolments ON tutorial_enrolments.project_id = projects.id').
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                    joins('LEFT OUTER JOIN tutorials ON tutorial_enrolments.tutorial_id = tutorials.id AND (tutorials.tutorial_stream_id = task_definitions.tutorial_stream_id OR tutorials.tutorial_stream_id IS NULL)').
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                    select(
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                      'tasks.id',
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                      'task_statuses.id as status_id',
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                      'task_definition_id',
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                      'tutorials.id AS tutorial_id',
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                      'tutorials.tutorial_stream_id AS tutorial_stream_id'
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                    ).
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                    where('tasks.task_status_id > 1').
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                    map do |r|
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                      {
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                        id: r.id,
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                        task_definition_id: r.task_definition_id,
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                        status: TaskStatus.id_to_key(r.status_id),
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                        tutorial_id: r.tutorial_id,
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                        tutorial_stream_id: r.tutorial_stream_id
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                      }
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                present result, with: Grape::Presenters::Presenter
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Refresh the most frequently changed task details for a project - allowing easy refresh of student details'
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                requires :project_id, type: Integer, desc: 'The id of the project with the task, or tasks to get'
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                requires :task_definition_id, type: Integer, desc: 'The id of the task definition to get, when not provided all tasks are returned'
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

              get '/projects/:project_id/refresh_tasks/:task_definition_id' do
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, project, :get
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'You do not have permission to access this project' }, 403)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

                base = project.tasks
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

                if params[:task_definition_id].present?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

                  base = base.where('tasks.task_definition_id = :task_definition_id', task_definition_id: params[:task_definition_id])
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

                result = base.
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

                  map do |task|
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

                    {
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

                      task_definition_id: task.task_definition_id,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                      status: TaskStatus.id_to_key(task.task_status_id),
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                      due_date: task.due_date,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

                      extensions: task.extensions
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                    }
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                if params[:task_definition_id].present?
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

                  result = result.first
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

            
          
      82.

                present result, with: Grape::Presenters::Presenter
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Get a similarity match for a given task'
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

              get '/tasks/:id/similarity/:count' do
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                unless authenticated?
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Not authorised to download details for task '#{params[:id]}'" }, 401)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                task = Task.find(params[:id])
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, task, :get_submission
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Not authorised to download details for task '#{params[:id]}'" }, 401)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                match = params[:count].to_i % task.similar_to_count
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                if match < 0
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Invalid match sequence, must be 0 or larger' }, 403)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                #match_link = task.plagiarism_match_links.order('created_at DESC')[match]
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                return if match_link.nil?
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                logger.debug "Plagiarism match link 1: #{match_link}"
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                other_match_link = match_link.other_party
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

                logger.debug "Plagiarism match link 2: #{other_match_link}"
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

                output = FileHelper.path_to_plagarism_html(match_link)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

                if output.nil? || !File.exist?(output)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'No files to download' }, 403)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

                if authorise? current_user, match_link.task, :view_plagiarism
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

                  student_url = match_link.plagiarism_report_url
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

                student_hash = {
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

                  username: match_link.student.username,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

                  email: match_link.student.email,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                  name: match_link.student.name,
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                  tutor: match_link.tutor.name,
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial: match_link.tutorial,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

                  html: File.read(output),
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

                  url: student_url,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                  pct: match_link.pct,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

                  dismissed: match_link.dismissed
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                }
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                other_student_hash = {
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                  username: nil,
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                  email: nil,
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                  name: nil,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                  tutor: match_link.other_tutor.name,
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial: match_link.other_tutorial,
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                  html: nil,
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

                  url: nil,
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

                  pct: other_match_link.pct,
          
      137.

                  dismissed: other_match_link.dismissed
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                }
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                # Check if returning both parties
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                authorised_to_view_both = authorise? current_user, other_match_link.task, :get_submission
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                if authorised_to_view_both
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                  other_output = FileHelper.path_to_plagarism_html(other_match_link)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                  if authorise? current_user, other_match_link.task, :view_plagiarism
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                    other_student_url = other_match_link.plagiarism_report_url
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                  # Update other_student_hash to include details
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                  other_student_hash[:username]  = match_link.other_student.username
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

                  other_student_hash[:email]     = match_link.other_student.email
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                  other_student_hash[:name]      = match_link.other_student.name
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                  other_student_hash[:tutor]     = match_link.other_tutor.name
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                  other_student_hash[:tutorial]  = match_link.other_tutorial
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                  other_student_hash[:html]      = File.read(other_output)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                  other_student_hash[:url]       = other_student_url
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                  other_student_hash[:pct]       = other_match_link.pct
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                  other_student_hash[:dismissed] = other_match_link.dismissed
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                result = {
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                  student: student_hash,
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                  other_student: other_student_hash
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                }
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                present result, with: Grape::Presenters::Presenter
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Dismiss a similarity match for a given task'
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                requires :dismissed, type: Boolean, desc: 'Should this similarity be dismissed?'
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                requires :other, type: Boolean, desc: 'This tasks match or its reverse?'
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

              put '/tasks/:id/similarity/:count' do
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                unless authenticated?
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Not authorised to access this task '#{params[:id]}'" }, 401)
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                task = Task.find(params[:id])
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, task, :delete_plagiarism
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Not authorised to remove similarity for task '#{params[:id]}'" }, 401)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                match = params[:count].to_i % task.similar_to_count
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                if match < 0
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Invalid match sequence, must be 0 or larger' }, 403)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                match_link = task.plagiarism_match_links.order('created_at DESC')[match]
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                return if match_link.nil?
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                match_link = match_link.other_party if params[:other]
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                logger.info "#{current_user.username} changing plagiarism: setting dismissed for #{task.task_definition.abbreviation} by #{task.student.username} to #{params[:dismissed]}"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                logger.debug "    plagiarism match link 1: #{match_link}"
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

                match_link.dismissed = params[:dismissed]
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                match_link.save!
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                present match_link.dismissed, with: Grape::Presenters::Presenter
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Pin a task to the user\'s task inbox'
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                requires :id, type: Integer, desc: 'The ID of the task to be pinned'
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      205.

      341.

                end

            require 'grape'

            class TeachingPeriodsAuthenticatedApi < Grape::API
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthenticationHelpers
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthorisationHelpers
          
      6.

      7.

              before do
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                authenticated?

    9. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      10.
