              desc 'Add a Teaching Period'
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                requires :teaching_period, type: Hash do
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                  requires :period, type: String, desc: 'The name of the teaching period'
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                  requires :year, type: Integer, desc: 'The year of the teaching period'
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                  requires :start_date, type: Date, desc: 'The start date of the teaching period'
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                  requires :end_date, type: Date, desc: 'The end date of the teaching period'
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                  requires :active_until, type: Date, desc: 'The teaching period will be active until this date'
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

              post '/teaching_periods' do
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, User, :handle_teaching_period
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to create a teaching period' }, 403)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                teaching_period_parameters = ActionController::Parameters.new(params)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                                                                          .require(:teaching_period)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                                                                          .permit(:period,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                                                                                  :year,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                                                                                  :start_date,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                                                                                  :end_date,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                                                                                  :active_until)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                result = TeachingPeriod.create!(teaching_period_parameters)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                if result.nil?
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'No teaching period added.' }, 403)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                  present result, with: Entities::TeachingPeriodEntity
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Update teaching period'
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                requires :id, type: Integer, desc: 'The teaching period id to update'
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                requires :teaching_period, type: Hash do
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                  optional :period, type: String, desc: 'The name of the teaching period'
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                  optional :year, type: Integer, desc: 'The year of the teaching period'
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                  optional :start_date, type: Date, desc: 'The start date of the teaching period'
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                  optional :end_date, type: Date, desc: 'The end date of the teaching period'
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                  optional :active_until, type: Date, desc: 'The teaching period will be active until this date'
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

              put '/teaching_periods/:id' do
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                teaching_period = TeachingPeriod.find(params[:id])
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, User, :handle_teaching_period
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to update a teaching period' }, 403)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                teaching_period_parameters = ActionController::Parameters.new(params)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

                                                                          .require(:teaching_period)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                                                                          .permit(:period,

    65. 
            
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

                teaching_period.update!(teaching_period_parameters)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

                teaching_period
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Delete a teaching period'
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

              delete '/teaching_periods/:teaching_period_id' do
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, User, :handle_teaching_period
          
      73.

                teaching_period_id = params[:teaching_period_id]

      78.

      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79.

              desc 'Rollover a Teaching Period'

      84.

      85.

      86.

    90.

      94.

      95.

              desc "Get a teaching period's details"

            class TutorialEnrolmentsApi < Grape::API
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthenticationHelpers
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthorisationHelpers
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

              before do
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                authenticated?
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

              end

    10. 
            
            

            

            
          
      11.

              desc 'Enrol project in a tutorial'
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

              post '/units/:unit_id/tutorials/:tutorial_abbr/enrolments/:project_id' do
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                project = unit.active_projects.find(params[:project_id])
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, project, :change_tutorial, ->(role, perm_hash, other) { project.specific_permission_hash(role, perm_hash, other) }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to change tutorial' }, 403)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                tutorial = unit.tutorials.find_by(abbreviation: params[:tutorial_abbr])
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                error!({ error: "No tutorial with abbreviation #{params[:tutorial_abbr]} exists for the unit" }, 403) unless tutorial.present?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                # If the tutorial has a capacity, and we are at that capacity, and the user does not have permissions to exceed capacity...
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                if tutorial.capacity > 0 && tutorial.tutorial_enrolments.count >= tutorial.capacity && ! authorise?(current_user, unit, :exceed_capacity)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Tutorial #{params[:tutorial_abbr]} is full and cannot accept further student enrolments" }, 403)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                result = project.enrol_in(tutorial)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                if result.nil?
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'No enrolment added' }, 403)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                  result
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                present :enrolments, project.tutorial_enrolments, with: Entities::TutorialEnrolmentEntity
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Delete an enrolment in the tutorial'
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

              delete '/units/:unit_id/tutorials/:tutorial_abbr/enrolments/:project_id' do
          
      40.

                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])

                project = unit.projects.find(params[:project_id])

      50.

                error!({ error: "Project not enrolled in the selected tutorial" }, 403) unless tutorial_enrolment.present?

                # present :enrolments, project.tutorial_enrolments, with: Entities::TutorialEnrolmentEntity
          
      54.

                present true, with: Grape::Presenters::Presenter
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      56.

            class TutorialStreamsApi < Grape::API
          
      4.

              helpers AuthenticationHelpers

              desc 'Add a tutorial stream to the unit'

              params do

    14. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

              post '/units/:unit_id/tutorial_streams' do
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :add_tutorial
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to add tutorial stream to this unit' }, 403)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                activity_type = ActivityType.find_by(abbreviation: params[:activity_type_abbr])
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                institution_settings = Doubtfire::Application.config.institution_settings
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                name,abbreviation = institution_settings.details_for_next_tutorial_stream(unit, activity_type)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                unit.add_tutorial_stream(name, abbreviation, activity_type)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Update a tutorial stream in the unit'
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                optional :name,               type: String,   desc: 'The name of the tutorial stream'

    32. 
            
            

            

                optional :abbreviation,       type: String,   desc: 'The abbreviation for the tutorial stream'
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                optional :activity_type_abbr, type: String,   desc: 'Abbreviation of the activity type'
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

              put '/units/:unit_id/tutorial_streams/:tutorial_stream_abbr' do
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :add_tutorial
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to update tutorial stream in this unit' }, 403)
          
      39.

                end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_stream = unit.tutorial_streams.find_by!(abbreviation: params[:tutorial_stream_abbr])
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                activity_type = ActivityType.find_by!(abbreviation: params[:activity_type_abbr]) if params[:activity_type_abbr].present?
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                unit.update_tutorial_stream(tutorial_stream, params[:name], params[:abbreviation], activity_type)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Delete a tutorial stream in the unit'
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

              delete '/units/:unit_id/tutorial_streams/:tutorial_stream_abbr' do
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :add_tutorial
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to delete tutorial stream in this unit' }, 403)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_stream = unit.tutorial_streams.find_by!(abbreviation: params[:tutorial_stream_abbr])
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_stream.destroy
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                error!({ error: tutorial_stream.errors.full_messages.last }, 403) unless tutorial_stream.destroyed?
          
      56.

                tutorial_stream.destroyed?
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58.

            end

    app/api/tutorials_api.rb

              desc 'Update a tutorial'

    12.

      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                requires :id, type: Integer, desc: 'The user id to update'
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                requires :tutorial, type: Hash do
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                  optional :abbreviation, type: String, desc: 'The tutorials code'
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                  optional :meeting_location, type: String,   desc: 'The tutorials location'
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                  optional :meeting_day, type: String, desc: 'Day of the tutorial'
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18.

      19.

      20.

              put '/tutorials/:id' do
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                tutorial = Tutorial.find(params[:id])
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                tut_params = params[:tutorial]
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                # can only modify if current_user.id is same as :id provided
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                # (i.e., user wants to update their own data) or if update_user token
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, tutorial.unit, :add_tutorial
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Cannot update tutorial with id=#{params[:id]} - not authorised" }, 403)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_parameters = ActionController::Parameters.new(params)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                                                                  .require(:tutorial)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                                                                  .permit(
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                                                                    :abbreviation,
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                                                                    :meeting_location,
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                                                                    :meeting_day,
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39.

    40.

      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                                                                    :capacity
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                                                                  )
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                if tut_params[:tutor_id]
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                  tutor = User.find(tut_params[:tutor_id])
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial.assign_tutor(tutor)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                if tutorial_parameters[:campus_id] == -1
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial_parameters[:campus_id] = nil
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                tutorial.update!(tutorial_parameters)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                present tutorial, with: Entities::TutorialEntity
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Create tutorial'
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      59.

                requires :tutorial, type: Hash do
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                  requires :unit_id,              type: Integer,  desc: 'Id of the unit'
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                  requires :tutor_id,             type: Integer,  desc: 'Id of the tutor'
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

                  requires :campus_id,            type: Integer,  desc: 'Id of the campus',                               allow_blank: false
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

                  requires :capacity,             type: Integer,  desc: 'Capacity of the tutorial',                       allow_blank: false
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

                  requires :abbreviation,         type: String,   desc: 'The tutorials code',                             allow_blank: false
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

                  requires :meeting_location,     type: String,   desc: 'The tutorials location',                         allow_blank: false
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66.

    67.

              post '/tutorials' do
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                tut_params = params[:tutorial]
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(tut_params[:unit_id])
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :add_tutorial
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to create new tutorials' }, 403)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

                tutor = User.find(tut_params[:tutor_id])
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                campus = tut_params[:campus_id] == -1 ? nil : Campus.find(tut_params[:campus_id])
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

                # Set Tutorial Stream if available
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_stream_abbr = tut_params[:tutorial_stream_abbr]
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_stream = unit.tutorial_streams.find_by!(abbreviation: tutorial_stream_abbr) unless tutorial_stream_abbr.nil?
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                tutorial = unit.add_tutorial(tut_params[:meeting_day], tut_params[:meeting_time], tut_params[:meeting_location], tutor, campus, tut_params[:capacity], tut_params[:abbreviation], tutorial_stream)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                present tutorial, with: Entities::TutorialEntity
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

            
          
      91.

      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                unless (authorise? current_user, unit_role.unit, :employ_staff) || (authorise? current_user, User, :admin_units)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Couldn't find Unit with id=#{params[:id]}" }, 403)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                unit_role_parameters = ActionController::Parameters.new(params)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                                                                    .require(:unit_role)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                                                                    .permit(
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                                                                      :role_id
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                                                                    )
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                if unit_role_parameters[:role_id] == Role.tutor.id && unit_role.role == Role.convenor && unit_role.unit.convenors.count == 1
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'There must be at least one convenor for the unit' }, 403)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

                unit_role.update!(unit_role_parameters)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                present unit_role, with: Entities::UnitRoleEntity
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      107.

                if params[:unit]

                                                              .permit(
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                                                                :name,
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                                                                :code,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                                                                :teaching_period_id,
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                                                                :description,
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                                                                :start_date,
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                                                                :end_date,
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                                                                :auto_apply_extension_before_deadline,
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                                                                :send_notifications,
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                                                                :enable_sync_timetable,
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

                                                                :enable_sync_enrolments,
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                                                                :allow_student_extension_requests,
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                                                                :extension_weeks_on_resubmit_request,
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                                                                :allow_student_change_tutorial,
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                                                              )
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

                if unit_parameters[:description].nil?
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                  unit_parameters[:description] = unit_parameters[:name]
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                teaching_period_id = unit_parameters[:teaching_period_id]
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                if teaching_period_id.blank?
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                  if unit_parameters[:start_date].nil?
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

                    start_date = Date.parse('Monday')
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                    delta = start_date > Date.today ? 0 : 7
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                    unit_parameters[:start_date] = start_date + delta
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                  if unit_parameters[:end_date].nil?
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

                    unit_parameters[:end_date] = unit_parameters[:start_date] + 16.weeks
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                  if unit_parameters[:start_date].present? || unit_parameters[:end_date].present?
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                    error!({ error: 'Cannot specify dates as teaching period is selected' }, 403)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

            
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.create!(unit_parameters)
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

                # Employ current user as convenor
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                unit.employ_staff(current_user, Role.convenor)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

                present unit, with: Entities::UnitEntity, user: current_user
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Rollover unit'
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

                optional :teaching_period_id
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                optional :start_date
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

                optional :end_date
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

                exactly_one_of :teaching_period_id, :start_date
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

                all_or_none_of :start_date, :end_date
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

              post '/units/:id/rollover' do
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:id])
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
            

            

                if !(authorise?( current_user, User, :rollover) || authorise?( current_user, unit, :rollover_unit))
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to rollover a unit' }, 403)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                teaching_period_id = params[:teaching_period_id]
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                if teaching_period_id.present?
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                  tp = TeachingPeriod.find(teaching_period_id)
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                  unit.rollover(tp, nil, nil)
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                  unit.rollover(nil, params[:start_date], params[:end_date])
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

                present unit, with: Entities::UnitEntity, user: current_user
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Download the tasks that are awaiting feedback for a unit'
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

              get '/units/:id/feedback' do
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:id])
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

            
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :provide_feedback
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to provide feedback for this unit' }, 403)
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

                tasks = unit.tasks_awaiting_feedback(current_user)
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

                present unit.tasks_as_hash(tasks), with: Grape::Presenters::Presenter
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

            
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Download the tasks that should be listed under the task inbox'
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255.

      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:id])
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

            
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :provide_feedback
          
      259.

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to provide feedback for this unit' }, 403)
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

            
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

                tasks = unit.tasks_for_task_inbox(current_user)
          
      263.

                present unit.tasks_as_hash(tasks), with: Grape::Presenters::Presenter
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

            
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Download the grades for a unit'

                unit = Unit.find(params[:id])
          
      269.

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :download_grades

      275.

      276.

      277.

                unit.student_grades_csv
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

            
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Upload CSV of all the students in a unit'
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

                requires :file, type: File, desc: 'CSV upload file.'
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
            

            

              post '/csv/units/:id' do
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:id])
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :upload_csv
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Not authorised to upload CSV of students to #{unit.code}" }, 403)
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
            

            

            
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
            

            

                unless params[:file].present?
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "No file uploaded" }, 403)
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293.

                ensure_csv!(params[:file][:tempfile])
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295.

    296. 
            
            

            

                # Actually import...
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
            

            

                unit.import_users_from_csv(params[:file][:tempfile])
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            
            

            

            
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Upload CSV with the students to un-enrol from the unit'
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
            

            

                requires :file, type: File, desc: 'CSV upload file.'
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            
            

            

              post '/csv/units/:id/withdraw' do
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:id])
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :upload_csv
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Not authorised to upload CSV of students to #{unit.code}" }, 403)
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
            

            

                logger.debug params
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
            

            

                unless params[:file].present?
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "No file uploaded" }, 403)
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            
            

            

            
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
            

            

                path = params[:file][:tempfile].path
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
            

            

            
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            
            

            

                ensure_csv! path
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            
            

            

            
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            
            

            

                # Actually withdraw...
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            
            

            

                response = unit.unenrol_users_from_csv(File.new(path))
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            
            

            

                present response, with: Grape::Presenters::Presenter
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            
            

            

            
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Download CSV of all students in this unit'
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            
            

            

              get '/csv/units/:id' do
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:id])

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :download_unit_csv
          
      327.

                content_type 'application/octet-stream'

      335.

      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Download stats related to the number of completed tasks'
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            
            

            

              get '/units/:id/stats/task_completion_stats' do
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:id])
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :download_stats
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Not authorised to download stats of student tasks in #{unit.code}" }, 403)
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            
            

            

            
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            
            

            

                present unit.student_task_completion_stats, with: Grape::Presenters::Presenter
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            
            

            

            
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Download stats related to the number of tasks assessed by each tutor'
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            
            

            

              get '/csv/units/:id/tutor_assessments' do
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            
            

            

                unit = Unit.find(params[:id])
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :download_stats
          
      383.

      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            
            

            

            
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            
            

            

                content_type 'application/octet-stream'
          
      387.

      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            
            

            

                env['api.format'] = :binary
          
      389.

      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390.

    391. 
            
            

            

              end

            end

              desc 'Get the list of users'

              desc 'Get user'

      24.

                unless (user.id == current_user.id) || (authorise? current_user, User, :admin_users)

    25.

      54.

              put '/users/:id' do
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

                change_self = (params[:id] == current_user.id)

      70.

      72.

                  user.role = Role.student if user.role.nil?
          
      95.

                  old_role = user.role
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                  # have to translate the system_role -> role

    98. 
            
            

            

                  # note we only let user_parameters role if we're actually *changing* the role
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                  # (i.e., not passing in the *same* role)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                  # You cannot change your own permissions

                  if !change_self && params[:user][:system_role] && old_role.id != Role.with_name(params[:user][:system_role]).id
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                    user_parameters[:role] = params[:user][:system_role]
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106.

                  # Only allow change of role if current user has permissions to demote/promote the user to the new role

    109. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      110.

                  if user_parameters[:role]

    111. 
            
            

            

                    # work out if promoting or demoting

    112. 
            
            

            

                    new_role = Role.with_name(user_parameters[:role])
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

                    if new_role.nil?
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

                      error!({ error: "No such role name #{user_parameters[:role]}" }, 403)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

                    action = new_role.id > old_role.id ? :promote_user : :demote_user
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

                    # current user not authorised to peform action with new role?
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                    unless authorise? current_user, User, action, User.get_change_role_perm_fn, [ old_role.to_sym, new_role.to_sym ]
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                      error!({ error: "Not authorised to #{action} user with id=#{params[:id]} to #{new_role.name}" }, 403)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

                    # update :role to actual Role object rather than String type
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

                    user_parameters[:role] = new_role
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                  # Update changes made to user
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                  user.update!(user_parameters)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                  present user, with: Entities::UserEntity
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Cannot modify user with id=#{params[:id]} - not authorised" }, 403)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

              end
