                user_parameters[:role] = params[:user][:system_role]
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                # Give new user their new role
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                new_role = Role.with_name(user_parameters[:role])
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                if new_role.nil?
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "No such role name #{user_parameters[:role]}" }, 403)
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                # Check permission to create user with this role
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, User, :create_user, User.get_change_role_perm_fn, [ :nil, new_role.name.downcase.to_sym ]
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "Not authorised to create new users with role #{new_role.name}" }, 403)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                # update :role to actual Role object rather than String type
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                user_parameters[:role] = new_role
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                logger.info "#{current_user.username}: Created new user #{user_parameters[:username]} with role #{new_role.name}"
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                user = User.create!(user_parameters)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                present user, with: Entities::UserEntity
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Upload CSV of users'
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                requires :file, type: File, desc: 'CSV upload file.'
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

              post '/csv/users' do
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, User, :upload_csv
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to upload CSV of users' }, 403)
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                unless params[:file].present?
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: "No file uploaded" }, 403)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205.

    206. 
            
            

            

                path = params[:file][:tempfile].path
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207.

    208. 
            
            

            

                # check mime is correct before uploading
          
      209.

                ensure_csv!(path)
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

                # Actually import...
          
      212.

      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Download CSV of all users'
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

              get '/csv/users' do
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                unless authorise? current_user, User, :download_system_csv
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to download CSV of all users' }, 403)
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

                content_type 'application/octet-stream'
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

                header['Content-Disposition'] = 'attachment; filename=doubtfire_users.csv '
          
      223.

                env['api.format'] = :binary

      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      226.

            end

            require 'grape'

    2. 
            
            

            

            require 'icalendar'

    3. 
            
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

            class WebcalApi < Grape::API
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

              helpers AuthenticationHelpers
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

              helpers do
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

                # Wraps the specified value (expected to be either `nil` or a `Webcal`) in a hash `{ enabled: true | false }` used
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

                # to prevent the API returning `null`.
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

                def present_webcal(webcal)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                  if webcal.present?
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                    present webcal, with: Entities::WebcalEntity
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                    response = { enabled: false }
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                    present response, with: Grape::Presenters::Presenter
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

              # Declare content types
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

              content_type :txt, 'text/calendar'
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

              before do
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                authenticated?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Get webcal details of the authenticated user'
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

              get '/webcal' do
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                present_webcal current_user.webcal
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Update webcal details of the authenticated user'
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                requires :webcal, type: Hash do
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                  optional :enabled,             type: Boolean,                                 desc: 'Is the webcal enabled?'
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                  optional :should_change_guid,  type: Boolean,                                 desc: 'Should the GUID of the webcal be changed?'
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                  optional :include_start_dates, type: Boolean,                                 desc: 'Should events for start dates be included?'
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                  optional :unit_exclusions,     type: Array[Integer],                          desc: 'IDs of units that must be excluded from the webcal'
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                  # `all_or_none_of` is used here instead of 2 `requires` parameters to allow `reminder` to be set to `null`.
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                  optional :reminder,            type: Hash do
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                    optional :time,              type: Integer
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                    optional :unit,              type: String, values: Webcal.valid_time_units, desc: 'w: weeks, d: days, h: hours, m: minutes'
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                    all_or_none_of :time, :unit
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

              put '/webcal' do
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                webcal_params = params[:webcal]
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                user = current_user
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                cal = Webcal
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                  .includes(:webcal_unit_exclusions)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                  .where(user_id: user.id)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                  .load
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

                  .first
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                # Create or destroy the user's webcal, according to the `enabled` parameter.
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

                if webcal_params.key?(:enabled)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

                  if webcal_params[:enabled] and cal.nil?
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

                    cal = user.create_webcal(guid: SecureRandom.uuid)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

                  elsif !webcal_params[:enabled] and cal.present?
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

                    cal.destroy
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

                if cal.nil? || cal.destroyed?
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

                  present_webcal nil
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                  return
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                webcal_update_params = {}
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

                # Change the GUID if requested.
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                if webcal_params.key?(:should_change_guid)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

                  webcal_update_params[:guid] = SecureRandom.uuid
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

                # Change the reminder if requested.
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

                if webcal_params.key?(:reminder)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                  if webcal_params[:reminder].nil?
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                    webcal_update_params[:reminder_time] = webcal_update_params[:reminder_unit] = nil
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                    webcal_update_params[:reminder_time] = webcal_params[:reminder][:time]
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                    webcal_update_params[:reminder_unit] = webcal_params[:reminder][:unit]
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                # Set any other properties that have to be updated verbatim.
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                webcal_update_params.merge! ActionController::Parameters.new(webcal_params).permit(
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                  :include_start_dates,
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                  :reminder_time,
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                  :reminder_unit
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                )
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                # Update calendar.
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                cal.update! webcal_update_params
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                # Update unit exclusions, if specified.
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

                if webcal_params.key?(:unit_exclusions)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                  # Delete existing exclusions.
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

                  cal.webcal_unit_exclusions.destroy_all
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

                  # Add exclusions with valid unit IDs.
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

                  if webcal_params[:unit_exclusions].any?
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

                    cal.webcal_unit_exclusions.create(
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

                      Unit
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

                        .joins(:projects)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

                        .where(
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

                          projects: { user_id: user.id },
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

                          units: { id: webcal_params[:unit_exclusions], active: true }
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

                        )
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

                        .pluck(:id)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

                        .map { |i| { unit_id: i } }
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

                    )
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

                present_webcal cal
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      126.

    app/api/webcal_public_api.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    13 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 13 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            
            

            

            require 'grape'
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
            

            

            require 'icalendar'
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

            class WebcalPublicApi < Grape::API
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

              desc 'Serve webcal with the specified GUID'
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

              params do
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                requires :guid, type: String, desc: 'The GUID of the webcal'
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

              get '/webcal/:guid' do
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

                # Retrieve the specified webcal.
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                webcal = Webcal.find_by!(guid: params[:guid])
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                # Serve the iCalendar with the correct MIME type.
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                content_type 'text/calendar'

            module AuthorisationHelpers

              def get_permission_hash(role, perm_hash, _other)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

                perm_hash[role] unless perm_hash.nil?
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

              # Authorises if the user can perform an action on the object
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

              # user - who

    10. 
            
            

            

              # object - context, what are we asking for permissions from
          
      11.

              # action - what action
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

              # perm_get_fn - which method do we call to get the permission hash. Can be used to get different hashes in different contexts. This returns hash of actions permitted
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

              def authorise?(user, object, action, perm_get_fn = method(:get_permission_hash), other = nil)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                # Can pass in instance or class
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                obj_class = object.class == Class ? object : object.class
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                role_obj = object.role_for(user)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                return false if role_obj.nil?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                role = role_obj.to_sym
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                perm_hash = obj_class.permissions
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                perms = perm_get_fn.call(role, perm_hash, other)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                # No permissions, default to false authorise, else check if the action
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                # is in the permissions hash
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                perms.nil? ? false : perms.include?(action)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31.

            end

              def csv_date_to_date(date)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

                return if date.nil? || date.empty?
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

                date = date.strip
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

                if date !~ /20\d\d\-\d{1,2}\-\d{1,2}$/ # Matches YYYY-mm-dd by default
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

                  if date =~ /\d{1,2}\-\d{1,2}\-20\d\d/ # Matches dd-mm-YYYY
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                    date = date.split('-').reverse.join('-')
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

                  elsif date =~ /\d{1,2}\/\d{1,2}\/20\d\d$/ # Matches dd/mm/YYYY
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

                    date = date.split('/').reverse.join('-')
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

                  elsif date =~ /\d{1,2}\/\d{1,2}\/\d\d$/ # Matches dd/mm/YY
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

                    date = "20#{date.split('/').reverse.join('-')}"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                  elsif date =~ /\d{1,2}\-\d{1,2}\-\d\d$/ # Matches dd-mm-YY
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                    date = "20#{date.split('-').reverse.join('-')}"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                  elsif date =~ /\d{1,2}\-\d{1,2}\-\d\d \d\d:\d\d:\d\d$/ # Matches dd-mm-YY hh:mm:ss
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                    date = date.split(' ').first
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                    date = "20#{date.split('-').reverse.join('-')}"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                  elsif date =~ /\d{1,2}\/\d{1,2}\/\d\d [\d:]+$/ # Matches dd/mm/YY 00:00:00
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                    date = date.split(' ').first
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                    date = "20#{date.split('/').reverse.join('-')}"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                end

    23.

              end
          
      26.

              def db_concat(*args)
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

                env = ENV['RAILS_ENV'] || 'development'
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

                adapter = ApplicationRecord.configurations.configs_for(env_name: env).first.configuration_hash[:adapter].to_sym
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

                args.map! { |arg| arg.class == Symbol ? arg.to_s : arg }
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

                case adapter
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                when :mysql, :mysql2
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

                  "CONCAT(#{args.join(',')})"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

                when :sqlserver
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

                  args.join('+')
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                  args.join('||')
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16.

              def accept_file(file, name, kind)

              def sanitized_path(*paths)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                safe_paths = paths.map do |path_name|
          
      50.

                  path_name.strip.tap do |name|
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                    # Finally, replace all non alphanumeric, underscore
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                    # or periods with underscore
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53.

      54.

              def sanitized_filename(filename)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

                filename.strip.tap do |name|
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

                  # NOTE: File.basename doesn't work right with Windows paths on Unix

                  # get only the filename, not the whole path

      68.

                  # Finally, replace all non alphanumeric, underscore
          
      69.

      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71.

              def student_group_work_dir(type, group_submission, task = nil, create = false)

                file_server = Doubtfire::Application.config.student_work_dir
