      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

                elsif type == :done
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

                  dst << sanitized_path("#{unit.code}-#{unit.id}", "Group-#{group.id}", type.to_s, group_submission.id.to_s) << '/'
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

                elsif type == :plagarism
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

                  dst << sanitized_path("#{unit.code}-#{unit.id}", "Group-#{group.id}", type.to_s, group_submission.id.to_s) << '/'
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

                else # new and in_process -- just have task id -- will link to group when done etc.
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

                  # Add task id to dst if we want task
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

                  raise 'Unable to locate file!' if task.nil?
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

                  dst << "#{type}/#{task.id}/"
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

                FileUtils.mkdir_p(dst) if create
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

                dst
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

              # Generates a path for storing student work
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

              # type = [:new, :in_process, :done, :pdf, :plagarism]
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

              def student_work_dir(type = nil, task = nil, create = true)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                if task && task.group_task? && type != :comment
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                  dst = student_group_work_dir type, task.group_submission, task
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                  file_server = Doubtfire::Application.config.student_work_dir
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                  dst = "#{file_server}/" # trust the server config and passed in type for paths
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                  if !(type.nil? || task.nil?)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                    if type == :discussion
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

                      dst << sanitized_path("#{task.project.unit.code}-#{task.project.unit.id}", task.project.student.username.to_s, type.to_s) << '/'
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

                    elsif type == :pdf
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

                      dst << sanitized_path("#{task.project.unit.code}-#{task.project.unit.id}", task.project.student.username.to_s, type.to_s) << '/'
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                    elsif type == :done
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

                      dst << sanitized_path("#{task.project.unit.code}-#{task.project.unit.id}", task.project.student.username.to_s, type.to_s, task.id.to_s) << '/'
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                    elsif type == :plagarism
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                      dst << sanitized_path("#{task.project.unit.code}-#{task.project.unit.id}", task.project.student.username.to_s, type.to_s, task.id.to_s) << '/'
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                    elsif type == :comment
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                      dst << sanitized_path("#{task.project.unit.code}-#{task.project.unit.id}", task.project.student.username.to_s, type.to_s) << '/'
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                    else # new and in_process -- just have task id
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                      # Add task id to dst if we want task
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                      dst << "#{type}/#{task.id}/"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                  elsif !type.nil?
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

                    if [:in_process, :new].include? type
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                      # Add task id to dst if we want task
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                      dst << "#{type}/"
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                      raise 'Error in request to student work directory'
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                # Create current dst directory should it not exist
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                FileUtils.mkdir_p(dst) if create
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                dst
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

              def unit_dir(unit, create = true)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                file_server = Doubtfire::Application.config.student_work_dir
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                dst = "#{file_server}/" # trust the server config and passed in type for paths
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

                dst << sanitized_path("#{unit.code}-#{unit.id}") << '/'
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                FileUtils.mkdir_p dst if create && (!Dir.exist? dst)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                dst
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

              def unit_portfolio_dir(unit, create = true)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                file_server = Doubtfire::Application.config.student_work_dir
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                dst = "#{file_server}/portfolio/" # trust the server config and passed in type for paths
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                dst << sanitized_path("#{unit.code}-#{unit.id}") << '/'
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                # Create current dst directory should it not exist
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

                FileUtils.mkdir_p(dst) if create
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                dst
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

              # Generates a path for storing student portfolios
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

              def student_portfolio_dir(unit, username, create = true)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                dst = unit_portfolio_dir(unit, create)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                dst << sanitized_path(username.to_s)
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                # Create current dst directory should it not exist
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

                FileUtils.mkdir_p(dst) if create
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                dst
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

              def student_portfolio_path(unit, username, create = true)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                File.join(student_portfolio_dir(unit, username, create), FileHelper.sanitized_filename("#{username}-portfolio.pdf"))
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

              def comment_attachment_path(task_comment, attachment_extension)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                "#{File.join( student_work_dir(:comment, task_comment.task), "#{task_comment.id.to_s}#{attachment_extension}")}"
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

              def comment_prompt_path(task_comment, attachment_extension, count)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                "#{File.join( student_work_dir(:discussion, task_comment.task), "#{task_comment.id.to_s}_#{count.to_s}#{attachment_extension}")}"
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

              def comment_reply_prompt_path(discussion_comment, attachment_extension)
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                "#{File.join( student_work_dir(:discussion, discussion_comment.task), "#{discussion_comment.id.to_s}_reply#{attachment_extension}")}"
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

              def compress_image_to_dest(source, dest, delete_frames = false)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

                exec = "convert -quiet \
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

                        \"#{source}\" \
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

                        #{ delete_frames ? '-delete 1--1' : ''} -strip -density 72 -quality 85% -resize 2048x2048\\> -resize 48x48\\< \
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                        \"#{dest}\" >>/dev/null 2>>/dev/null"
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

                did_compress = system_try_within 40, 'compressing image using convert', exec
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

              def compress_pdf(path, max_size = 2_500_000)
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

                # trusting path... as it needs to be replaced
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

                logger.debug "Compressing PDF #{path} (#{File.size?(path)} bytes) using GhostScript"
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

                # only compress things over max_size -- defaults to 2.5mb
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
            

            

                return if File.size?(path) < max_size
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

            
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                begin
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

                  tmp_file = File.join(Dir.tmpdir, 'doubtfire', 'compress', "#{File.dirname(path).split(File::Separator).last}-file.pdf")
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                  FileUtils.mkdir_p(File.join(Dir.tmpdir, 'doubtfire', 'compress'))
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                  exec = "gs -sDEVICE=pdfwrite \
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                             -dDetectDuplicateImages=true \
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                             -dPDFSETTINGS=/printer \
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

                             -dNOPAUSE \
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                             -dBATCH \
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

                             -dQUIET \
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

                             -sOutputFile=\"#{tmp_file}\" \
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

                             \"#{path}\" \
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

                             >>/dev/null 2>>/dev/null"
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                  # try with ghostscript
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

                  did_compress = system_try_within 30, 'compressing PDF using ghostscript', exec
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

            
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                  unless did_compress
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

                    logger.info "Failed to compress PDF #{path} using GhostScript. Trying with convert"
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

            
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

                    exec = "convert \"#{path}\" \
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

                            -compress Zip \
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

                            \"#{tmp_file}\" \
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

                            >>/dev/null 2>>/dev/null"
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                    # try with convert
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

                    did_compress = system_try_within 40, 'compressing PDF using convert', exec
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                    unless did_compress
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                      logger.error "Failed to compress PDF #{path} using convert. Cannot compress this PDF. Command was:\n\t#{exec}"
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

            
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                  FileUtils.mv tmp_file, path if did_compress
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

            
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

                  logger.error "Failed to compress PDF #{path}. Rescued with error:\n\t#{e.message}"
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
            

            

            
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

                FileUtils.rm tmp_file if File.exist? tmp_file
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

            
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
            

            

              # Move files between stages - new -> in process -> done
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

              def move_files(from_path, to_path, retain_from = false)
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

                # move into the new dir - and mv files to the in_process_dir
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
            

            

                pwd = FileUtils.pwd
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
            

            

                begin
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

                  FileUtils.mkdir_p(to_path) unless Dir.exist? to_path
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

                  Dir.chdir(from_path)
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

                  FileUtils.mv Dir.glob('*'), to_path, force: true
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

                  Dir.chdir(to_path)
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
            

            

                  begin
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

                    # remove from_path as files are now "in process"
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
            

            

                    # these can be retained when the old folder wants to be kept
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
            

            

                    FileUtils.rm_r(from_path) unless retain_from
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

                  rescue
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

                    logger.warn "failed to rm #{from_path}"
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
            

            

                ensure
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
            

            

                  if FileUtils.pwd != pwd
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
            

            

                    if Dir.exist? pwd
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
            

            

                      FileUtils.chdir(pwd)
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
            

            

                      FileUtils.chdir(student_work_dir)
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
            

            

            
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
            

            

              # Tests if a PDF is valid / corrupt
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
            

            

              def pdf_valid?(filename)
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
            

            

                # Scan last 1024 bytes for the EOF mark
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            
            

            

                return false unless File.exist? filename
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            
            

            

                File.open(filename) do |f|
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
            

            

                  f.seek -4096, IO::SEEK_END unless f.size <= 4096
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
            

            

                  f.read.include? '%%EOF'
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
            

            

            
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            
            

            

              # Copy a PDF into place
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
            

            

              def copy_pdf(file, dest_path)
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
            

            

                if pdf_valid? file
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            
            

            

                  compress_pdf(file)
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            
            

            

                  FileUtils.cp file, dest_path
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            
            

            

                  true
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            
            

            

                  false
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            
            

            

            
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
            

            

              # Read the file and return its contents as a string
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            
            

            

              def read_file_to_str(filename)
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            
            

            

                result = ''
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            
            

            

                f = File.open(filename, 'r')
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            
            

            

                begin
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            
            

            

                  f.each_line do |line|
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            
            

            

                    result += line
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            
            

            

                ensure
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            
            

            

                  f.close unless f.nil?
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            
            

            

                result
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            
            

            

            
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            
            

            

              def path_to_plagarism_html(match_link)
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            
            

            

                to_dir = student_work_dir(:plagarism, match_link.task)
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            
            

            

            
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            
            

            

                File.join(to_dir, "link_#{match_link.other_task.id}.html")
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            
            

            

            
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            
            

            

              # Save the passed in html to a file.
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            
            

            

              def save_plagiarism_html(match_link, html)
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            
            

            

                File.open(path_to_plagarism_html(match_link), 'w') do |out_file|
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            
            

            

                  out_file.puts html
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            
            

            

            
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            
            

            

              # Delete the html for a plagarism link
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            
            

            

              def delete_plagarism_html(match_link)
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            
            

            

                rm_file = path_to_plagarism_html(match_link)
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            
            

            

                if File.exist? rm_file
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            
            

            

                  FileUtils.rm(rm_file)
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            
            

            

                  to_dir = student_work_dir(:plagarism, match_link.task)
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            
            

            

            
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            
            

            

                  FileUtils.rm_rf(to_dir) if Dir[File.join(to_dir, '*.html')].count.zero?
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            
            

            

            
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            
            

            

                self
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            
            

            

            
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            
            

            

              def delete_group_submission(group_submission)
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            
            

            

                pdf_file = PortfolioEvidence.final_pdf_path_for_group_submission(group_submission)
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            
            

            

                logger.debug "Deleting group submission PDF file #{pdf_file}"
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            
            

            

                FileUtils.rm pdf_file if File.exist? pdf_file
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            
            

            

            
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            
            

            

                done_file = zip_file_path_for_group_done_task(group_submission)
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            
            

            

                FileUtils.rm done_file if File.exist? done_file
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            
            

            

                self
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            
            

            

            
          
      380.

              def zip_file_path_for_group_done_task(group_submission)

    381. 
            
            

            

                zip_file = "#{student_group_work_dir(:done, group_submission)[0..-2]}.zip"
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            
            

            

            
          
      384.

              def zip_file_path_for_done_task(task)
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            
            

            

                zip_file = "#{student_work_dir(:done, task, false)[0..-2]}.zip"
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            
            

            

            
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            
            

            

              def zip_file_path_for_discussion_prompts(task)

    389. 
            
            

            

                zip_file = "#{student_work_dir(:discussion, task, false)[0..-2]}.zip"
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            
            

            

            
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            
            

            

              # Compress the done files for a student - includes cover page and work uploaded
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            
            

            

              def compress_done_files(task)
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            
            

            

                task_dir = student_work_dir(:done, task, false)
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            
            

            

                zip_file = zip_file_path_for_done_task(task)
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            
            

            

                return if zip_file.nil? || (!Dir.exist? task_dir)
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            
            

            

            
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            
            

            

                FileUtils.rm(zip_file) if File.exist? zip_file
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            
            

            

            
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            
            

            

                input_files = Dir.entries(task_dir).select { |f| (f =~ /^\d{3}\.(cover|document|code|image)/).zero? }
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            
            

            

            
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            
            

            

                Zip::File.open(zip_file, Zip::File::CREATE) do |zip|
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            
            

            

                  zip.mkdir task.id.to_s
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            
            

            

                  input_files.each do |in_file|
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            
            

            

                    zip.add "#{task.id}/#{in_file}", "#{task_dir}#{in_file}"
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            
            

            

            
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            
            

            

                FileUtils.rm_rf(task_dir)
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            
            

            

            
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            
            

            

              def write_entries_to_zip(entries, disk_root_path, zip_root_path, path, zip)
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            
            

            

                entries.each do |e|
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            
            

            

                  # puts "Adding entry #{e}"
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            
            

            

                  file_path = path == '' ? e : File.join(path, e)
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            
            

            

                  zip_file_path = zip_root_path == '' ? file_path : File.join(zip_root_path, file_path)
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            
            

            

                  disk_file_path = File.join(disk_root_path, file_path)
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            
            

            

            
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            
            

            

                  if File.directory? disk_file_path
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            
            

            

                    # puts "Making dir: #{zip_file_path} for #{disk_file_path}"
          
      423. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    423. 
            
            

            

                    zip.mkdir(zip_file_path)
          
      424. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    424. 
            
            

            

                    subdir = (Dir.entries(disk_file_path) - %w(. ..))
          
      425. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    425. 
            
            

            

                    # puts "subdir: #{subdir}"
          
      426. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    426. 
            
            

            

                    write_entries_to_zip(subdir, disk_root_path, zip_root_path, file_path, zip)
          
      427. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    427. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      428. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    428. 
            
            

            

                    # puts "Adding file: #{disk_file_path} -- #{File.exist? disk_file_path}"
          
      429. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    429. 
            
            

            

                    zip.get_output_stream(zip_file_path) do |f|
          
      430. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    430. 
            
            

            

                      f.puts(File.open(disk_file_path, 'rb').read)
          
      431. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    431. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      432. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    432. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      433. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    433. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      434. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    434. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      435. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    435. 
            
            

            

            
          
      436. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    436. 
            
            

            

              def recursively_add_dir_to_zip(zip, dir, zip_root_path)
          
      437. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    437. 
            
            

            

                entries = Dir.entries(dir) - %w(. ..)
          
      438. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    438. 
            
            

            

                zip.mkdir(zip_root_path)
          
      439. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    439. 
            
            

            

                write_entries_to_zip(entries, dir, zip_root_path, '', zip)
          
      440. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    440. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      441. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    441. 
            
            

            

            
          
      442. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    442. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      443. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    443. 
            
            

            

              # Extract the files from the zip file for this tasks, and replace in new so that it is created
          
      444. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    444. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      445. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    445. 
            
            

            

              def move_compressed_task_to_new(task)
          
      446. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    446. 
            
            

            

                # student_work_dir(:new, task) # create task dir
          
      447. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    447. 
            
            

            

                task.extract_file_from_done student_work_dir(:new), '*', ->(_task, to_path, name) { "#{to_path}#{name}" }
          
      448. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    448. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      449. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    449. 
            
            

            

            
          
      450. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    450. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      451. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    451. 
            
            

            

              # Ensure that the contents of a file appear to be valid UTF8, on retry convert to ASCII to ensure
          
      452. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    452. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            
            

            

              def ensure_utf8_code(output_filename, force_ascii)
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454. 
            
            

            

                # puts "Converting #{output_filename} to utf8"
          
      455. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    455. 
            
            

            

                tmp_filename = Dir::Tmpname.create( [ "new", ".code" ] ) { }
          
      456. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    456. 
            
            

            

            
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            
            

            

                # Convert to utf8 from read encoding
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            
            

            

                if force_ascii
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            
            

            

                  `iconv -c -t ascii "#{output_filename}" > "#{tmp_filename}"`
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            
            

            

                  `iconv -c -t UTF-8 "#{output_filename}" > "#{tmp_filename}"`
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            
            

            

            
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            
            

            

                # Move into place
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            
            

            

                FileUtils.mv(tmp_filename, output_filename)
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            
            

            

            
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            
            

            

              def process_audio(input_path, output_path)
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            
            

            

                logger.info("Trying to process audio in FileHelper")
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            
            

            

                path = Doubtfire::Application.config.institution[:ffmpeg]
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            
            

            

                TimeoutHelper.system_try_within 20, "Failed to process audio submission - timeout", "#{path} -loglevel quiet -y -i #{input_path} -ac 1 -ar 16000 -sample_fmt s16 #{output_path}"
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            
            

            

            
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            
            

            

              def sorted_timestamp_entries_in_dir(path)
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            
            

            

                Dir.entries(path).reject{|entry| entry !~ /\d+/}.sort_by { |x| File.basename(x) }.reverse
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            
            

            

            
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            
            

            

              def latest_submission_timestamp_entry_in_dir(path)
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            
            

            

                sorted_timestamp_entries_in_dir(path)[0]
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            
            

            

            
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            
            

            

              def task_submission_identifier_path(type, task)
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            
            

            

                file_server = Doubtfire::Application.config.student_work_dir
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            
            

            

                "#{file_server}/submission_history/#{sanitized_path("#{task.project.unit.code}-#{task.project.unit.id}", task.project.student.username.to_s, type.to_s, task.id.to_s)}"
          
      485. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    485. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      486. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    486. 
            
            

            

            
          
      487. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    487. 
            
            

            

              def task_submission_identifier_path_with_timestamp(type, task, timestamp)
          
      488. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    488. 
            
            

            

                "#{task_submission_identifier_path(type, task)}/#{timestamp.to_s}"
          
      489. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    489.

              def mime_type(file_path)

              def excel_to_csv(file, extn)

              def ensure_csv!(file_path)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                file_path = file_path.path if file_path.is_a?(Tempfile)

    21. 
            
            

            

                type = mime_type(file_path)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                # check mime is correct before uploading
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                accept = ['text/', 'text/plain', 'text/csv',  'application/csv', 'application/vnd.ms-excel', 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet']
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                unless type.start_with?(*accept)
          
      26.

              #     long_operation()

              def try_within(sec, timeout_message = 'operation')
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                begin
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                  Timeout::timeout(sec) { yield }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                rescue
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                  logger.error "Timeout when #{timeout_message} after #{sec}s"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

              # Timeout system call
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

              # Usage:
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

              #   system_try_within 30, "doing the thing", "gs do.pdf the.pdf thing.pdf"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

              def system_try_within(sec, timeout_message, command)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                # shell script to kill command after timeout
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                timeout_exec = Rails.root.join('lib', 'shell', 'timeout.sh')
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                result = false
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                try_within sec, timeout_message do
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                  result = system "#{timeout_exec} -t #{sec} nice -n 10 #{command}"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                result
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

              # Export functions as module functions
          
      37.

              module_function :try_within

              module_function :system_try_within

    39. 
            
            

            

            end

              def request_project_membership(user, _convenor, unit, _first_name, _last_name)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

                @doubtfire_product_name = Doubtfire::Application.config.institution[:product_name]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

                
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

                institution_email_domain = Doubtfire::Application.config.institution[:email_domain]
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

                admin_emails = User.admins.map(&:email)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                user_email = "#{user.username}@#{institution_email_domain}"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

                mail to: admin_emails,
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

                     from: user_email,
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

                     subject: "[#{@doubtfire_product_name}] Please add #{user.username} to #{unit.name}",

              def self.generate(user, remember, expiry_time = Time.zone.now + 2.hours)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

                # Loop until new unique auth token is found
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                token = loop do
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                  token = Devise.friendly_token
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15.

                # Create a new AuthToken with this value

                result.authentication_token = token

              def extend_token(remember, expiry_time = Time.zone.now + 2.hours, save = true)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                # Extended expiry times only apply to students and convenors

                if remember
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                  student_expiry_time = Time.zone.now + 2.weeks

                  tutor_expiry_time = Time.zone.now + 1.week

    39.

      40.

    43. 
            
            

            

                    elsif role == Role.tutor || role == :tutor
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                      tutor_expiry_time
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45.

              def ensure_break_end_is_within_teaching_period

              def ensure_break_is_not_colliding
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                for break_in_teaching_period in teaching_period.breaks do
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                  if break_in_teaching_period.id != id && break_in_teaching_period.end_date >= start_date && break_in_teaching_period.start_date <= end_date

    25. 
            
            

            

                    errors.add(:base, "overlaps another break")
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                    break

    27.

      28.

              def duration

              def first_monday
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                return start_date if start_date.wday == 1
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                return start_date + 1.day if start_date.wday == 0
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                return start_date + (8 - start_date.wday).days
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

              def monday_after_break

                first_monday + number_of_weeks.weeks

              end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

              def end_date

    47. 
            
            

            

              end

    48. 
            
            

            

            end

                    arg
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                }.join('/')
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

            
          
      37.

                Rails.cache.fetch("campuses/#{key}", expires_in: 12.hours) do
          
      38.

                  super
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39.

              def self.find_by_abbr_or_name(data)

              def invalidate_cache

              def can_destroy?

            class ExtensionComment < TaskComment

              def serialize(user)

              # Make sure we can access super's version of mark_as_read for assess extension

              alias :super_mark_as_read :mark_as_read

    22. 
            
            

            

            
          
      23.

              # Allow individual staff and the student to read this... but stop
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

              # the main tutor reading without assessing. As only the main tutor
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

              # propagates reads, this will work as required - other staff cant
