    26. 
            
            

            

              # make it read for the main tutor.
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

              def mark_as_read(user, unit = self.unit)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                super if assessed? || user == project.student || user != recipient
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

              def assess_extension(user, granted, automatic = false)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                if self.assessed?
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                  self.errors[:extension] << 'has already been assessed'
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                  return false
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                self.assessor = user
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                self.date_extension_assessed = Time.zone.now
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                self.extension_granted = granted && self.task.can_apply_for_extension?
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                if self.extension_granted
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                  self.task.grant_extension(user, extension_weeks)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                  if automatic
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                    self.extension_response = "Time extended to #{self.task.due_date.strftime('%a %b %e')}"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                    self.extension_response = "Extension granted to #{self.task.due_date.strftime('%a %b %e')}"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                elsif ! self.task.can_apply_for_extension? && granted
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                  self.extension_response = "Extension cannot be granted as deadline has been reached"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                  errors[:extension] << 'cannot be granted as deadline has been reached'
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                  self.extension_response = "Extension rejected"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                # Now make sure to read it by the main tutor - even if assessed by someone else
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                super_mark_as_read(project.tutor_for(task.task_definition))
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                save!
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      60.

    app/models/comments/task_comment.rb

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            class TaskComment < ApplicationRecord

      19.

              has_many :comments_read_receipts, class_name: 'CommentsReadReceipts', dependent: :destroy, inverse_of: :task_comment
          
      20.

              # Can optionally be a reply to a comment

              belongs_to :task_comment, optional: true

              validates :task, presence: true

              validates :recipient, presence: true

              validates :comment, length: { minimum: 0, maximum: 4095, allow_blank: true }

              validate :valid_reply_to?, on: :create

              def valid_reply_to?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                if reply_to_id.present?
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                  originalTaskComment = TaskComment.find(reply_to_id)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                  replyProject = originalTaskComment.project
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                  errors.add(:task_comment, "Not a reply to a valid task comment") unless originalTaskComment.present?
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                  errors.add(:task_comment, "Original comment is not in this task") unless task.all_comments.find(reply_to_id).present?
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                  errors.add(:task_comment, "Not authorised to reply to comment") unless authorise?(user, originalTaskComment.project, :get) || (task.group_task? && task.group.role_for(user) != nil)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                end

                FileUtils.rm attachment_path if File.exist? attachment_path

              def serialize(user)

                {

              def create_comment_read_receipt_entry(user)

              def comment
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                return 'audio comment' if content_type == 'audio'

                return 'image comment' if content_type == 'image'
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

                return 'pdf document' if content_type == 'pdf'
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

                return 'discussion comment' if content_type == 'discussion'
          
      84.

              def add_attachment(file_upload)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                if content_type == 'audio'
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                  # On upload all audio comments are converted to wav
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                  temp = Tempfile.new(['comment', '.wav'])
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                  return false unless process_audio(file_upload["tempfile"].path, temp.path)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                  self.attachment_extension = '.wav'
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                  save
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                  FileUtils.mv temp.path, attachment_path
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

                elsif content_type == 'image'
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                  self.attachment_extension = if mime_type(file_upload["tempfile"].path).starts_with?('image/gif')
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                                                '.gif'
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

                                              else
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

                                                '.jpg'
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

                                              end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

                  save
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

                  FileHelper.compress_image_to_dest(file_upload["tempfile"].path, attachment_path)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

                  self.attachment_extension = '.pdf'
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

                  save
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

                  FileHelper.compress_pdf(file_upload["tempfile"].path)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

                  FileUtils.mv file_upload["tempfile"].path, attachment_path
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

                file_upload["tempfile"].unlink
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                true
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

            
          
      123.

              def attachment_mime_type

              def remove_comment_read_entry(user)

                CommentsReadReceipts.delete_all(user: user, task_comment: self)

              def mark_as_read(user, unit = self.unit)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

                return if read_by?(user) # avoid propagating if not needed
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                if user == project.tutor_for(task.task_definition)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

                  unit.staff.each do |staff_member|
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                    create_comment_read_receipt_entry(staff_member.user)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                  create_comment_read_receipt_entry(user)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

              def mark_as_unread(user)
          
      148.

                remove_comment_read_entry(user)

              end

              def new_for?(user)

                ! read_by? user

              def read_by?(user)

                CommentsReadReceipts.find_by(user: user, task_comment: self).present?

              end

      159.

              def time_read_by(user)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                read_reciept = CommentsReadReceipts.find_by(user: user, task_comment: self)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                read_reciept&.created_at
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163.

            class Group < ApplicationRecord

    33. 
            
            

            

              # Permissions around group data
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

              def self.permissions
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                # What can students do with groups?
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                student_role_permissions = [
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                  :get_members
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                ]
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                # What can tutors do with groups?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                tutor_role_permissions = [
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                  :get_members,
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                  :manage_group,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                  :lock_group,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                  :move_tutorial
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                ]
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                # What can convenors do with groups?
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                convenor_role_permissions = [
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                  :get_members,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                  :manage_group,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                  :lock_group,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                  :can_exceed_capacity,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                  :move_tutorial
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                ]
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                # What can admin do with groups?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                admin_role_permissions = [
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                  :get_members,
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                  :manage_group,
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

                  :lock_group,
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                  :can_exceed_capacity,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                  :move_tutorial
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

                ]
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

                # What can nil users do with groups?
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

                nil_role_permissions = [
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

                ]
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

                # Return permissions hash
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

                {
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

                  admin: admin_role_permissions,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

                  convenor: convenor_role_permissions,
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

                  tutor: tutor_role_permissions,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                  student: student_role_permissions,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                  nil: nil_role_permissions
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

                }
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

              def ensure_no_submissions
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                return true if group_submissions.count.zero?
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

                errors[:base] << 'Cannot delete group while it has submissions.'
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                throw :abort
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

              def specific_permission_hash(role, perm_hash, _other)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                result = perm_hash[role] unless perm_hash.nil?
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                if result && role == :student
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                  result << :manage_group if (!locked && !group_set.locked && group_set.allow_students_to_manage_groups)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                result
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

              def role_for(user)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                result = unit.role_for(user)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                if result == Role.student
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                  result = nil unless has_user user
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                result
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

              def has_user(user)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                projects.where('user_id = :user_id', user_id: user.id).count == 1
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

              def capacity
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                result = group_set.capacity
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

                if result.present?
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

                  result += capacity_adjustment
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

                result
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

              def student_count
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

                group_memberships.joins(:project).where(active: true, 'projects.enrolled' => true).count
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

              def at_capacity?
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

                capacity.present? && student_count >= capacity
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

              def beyond_capacity?
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                capacity.present? && student_count > capacity
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

              def switch_to_tutorial tutorial
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                return if tutorial_id == tutorial.id
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                Group.transaction do
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial_id = tutorial.id
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                  self.tutorial = tutorial
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                  if group_set.keep_groups_in_same_class && has_active_group_members?
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                    projects.each do |proj|
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                      # We need to remove members to break the circular dependency and switch tutorial
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                      remove_member(proj)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

                      te = proj.enrol_in tutorial
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

                      unless te.valid?
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                        raise "Unable to move group as #{proj.student.name} could not switch tutorial."
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                      add_member(proj)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                  self.save!
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

              def add_member(project)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

                gm = project.group_membership_for_groupset(group_set)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                if gm.nil?
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                  gm = GroupMembership.create(group: self, project: project)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                  group_memberships << gm
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                  gm = GroupMembership.find(gm.id)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                  gm.group = self
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                gm.active = true
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                gm.save!
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                gm
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

              def remove_member(project)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

                gm = group_memberships.where(project: project).first
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                gm.active = false
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                gm.save
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                self
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

              # check if the project is the same as the current submission
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

              def __different_project_composition__(contributors, gs)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                logger.debug 'Starting checks'
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                contributors.each do |contrib|
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                  logger.debug "-- Checking #{contrib}"
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                  return true unless gs.projects.include? contrib[:project]
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

                  return true unless contrib[:pct].to_i > 0
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                logger.debug "Checking #{contributors.count} == #{gs.projects.count}"
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                contributors.count != gs.projects.count
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

              # The submitter task is the user who submitted this group task.
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

              # Creates a Group Submission
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

              # Locates other group members, and link to this submission.
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

              #   - contributors contains [ {project: ..., pct: ... } ]
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

              def create_submission(submitter_task, notes, contributors)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                total = 0
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                # check all members are in the same group
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

                contributors.each do |contrib|
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                  project = contrib[:project]
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                  pct = contrib[:pct].to_i
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

                  pts = contrib[:pts].to_i
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                  if pct < 0
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                    contrib[:pct] = 0
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                    total += pct
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

            
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

                  contrib[:pts] = 0 unless pts > 0
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

                  contrib[:pts] = 5 unless pts < 5
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                  raise 'Not all contributions were from team members.' unless projects.include? project
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

                # check for all group members
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

                raise 'Contributions missing for some group members' unless projects.count == contributors.count
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

                # check pct
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                raise 'Contribution percentages are insufficient.' unless total >= 90
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

                raise 'Contribution percentages are excessive.' unless total <= 110
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

                # check group task
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

                raise 'Group submission only allowed for group tasks.' unless submitter_task.task_definition.group_set
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

                raise 'Group submission for wrong group for unit.' unless submitter_task.task_definition.group_set == group_set
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

            
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

                old_gs = submitter_task.group_submission
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

                gs = old_gs
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
            

            

                if gs.nil? || __different_project_composition__(contributors, gs)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

                  gs = GroupSubmission.create
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                  gs.task_definition = submitter_task.task_definition
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

            
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

                gs.group = self
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                gs.notes = notes
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                gs.submitted_by_project = submitter_task.project
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                gs.save!
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                contributors.each do |contrib|
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

                  project = contrib[:project]
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

                  task = project.matching_task submitter_task
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

            
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

                  next if task.task_submission_closed?
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                  if contrib[:pct].to_i > 0
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243.

              def propagate_transition(initial_task, trigger, by_user, quality)

    33.

              def submitter_task

            class LearningOutcome < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
            

            

              include ApplicationHelper
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

              belongs_to :unit, optional: false
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

              has_many :learning_outcome_task_links, dependent: :destroy # links to learning outcomes
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

              has_many :related_task_definitions, -> { where('learning_outcome_task_links.task_id is NULL') }, through: :learning_outcome_task_links, source: :task_definition # only link staff relations
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9.

      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

              validates :description, length: { maximum: 4095, allow_blank: true }
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

              def self.csv_header

              def add_csv_row(row)

              def self.create_from_csv(unit, row, result)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                unit_code = row['unit_code']

    22. 
            
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                if unit_code != unit.code

    24.

    25. 
            
            

            

                  return
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27.

    28. 
            
            

            

                ilo_number = row['ilo_number'].to_i
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                abbr = row['abbreviation']
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                if abbr.nil?
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                  result[:errors] << { row: row, message: 'Missing abbreviation' }
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                  return
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34.

      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                name = row['name']

    37. 
            
            

            

                if name.nil?
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38.

      40.

      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                description = row['description']
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                if description.nil?
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                  result[:errors] << { row: row, message: 'Missing description' }

      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                outcome = LearningOutcome.find_or_create_by(unit_id: unit.id, abbreviation: abbr) do |outcome|
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                  outcome.name = name
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50.

      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51.

      53.

    54. 
            
            

            

                outcome.save!
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56.

      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                                      { row: row, message: "Outcome #{abbr} created for unit" }
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                                    else
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59.

    60.

      61.

              end

            end

            class LearningOutcomeTaskLink < ApplicationRecord

              def duplicate_to(new_unit)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                result = self.dup
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

            
          
      33.

    34. 
            
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35.

    36.

      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38.

    39. 
            
            

            

                throw "Unable to find Task Definition #{self.task_definition.abbreviation} in unit #{new_unit.code}" if task_def.nil?
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                result.learning_outcome = ilo
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42.

      43.

              def self.export_task_alignment_to_csv(unit, source)

      53.

              end

            class OverseerAssessment < ApplicationRecord

                # Create only if:

              def copy_latest_files_to_submission

                zip_file_path = submission_zip_file_name

      73.
