                else
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

                  puts "Copying done file to submission at: #{zip_file_path}"
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                  task.copy_done_to zip_file_path
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

              # Path to where the submission and output are stored - includes the submission when it is to be processed
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

              def output_path
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

                FileHelper.task_submission_identifier_path_with_timestamp(:done, task, submission_timestamp)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

              def add_assessment_comment(text = 'Automated Assessment Started')
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                text.strip!
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                return nil if text.nil? || text.empty?
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                tutor = project.tutor_for(task.task_definition)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                # Need to ensure all group members have a task...
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

                task.ensured_group_submission if task.group_task? && task.group
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                comment = AssessmentComment.create
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                comment.task = task
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                comment.user = tutor
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                comment.comment = text
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                comment.recipient = project.student
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                comment.overseer_assessment = self
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                comment.save!
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                comment
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

              def update_assessment_comment(text)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                text.strip!
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

                return nil if text.nil? || text.empty?
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

                assessment_comment = assessment_comments.last
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

                # Don't add if there is already a task assessment comment for this task
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

                if assessment_comment.present?
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

                  # In case the main tutor changes
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

                  assessment_comment.comment = text
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

                  assessment_comment.save!
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

                  return assessment_comment
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

                puts "WARN: Unexpected need to create assessment comment for OverseerAssessment: #{self.id}"
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                add_assessment_comment text
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

              def send_to_overseer()
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                return {error: "Your task is already queued for processing. Pleasse wait until you receive a response before queueing your task again."} if self.status == :queued
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                #TODO: Check status and do not queue if already queued
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                puts "********* Sending #{self.id} to overseer"
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                sm_instance = Doubtfire::Application.config.sm_instance
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                if sm_instance.nil?
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                  puts "ERROR: Unable to get service manager to send message to overseer. Unable to send - OverseerAssessment #{id}"
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                  return {error: "Automated feedback is not configured correctly. Please raise an issue with your administrator. ERR:O1" }
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

                unless has_submission_files?
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

                  puts "ERROR: Attempting to send submission to Overseer without associated submission files - OverseerAssessment #{id}"
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                  return {error: "Your submission does not include any files to be processed." }
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                # Proceed only if:
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                # unit's assessment is enabled &&
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                # task's assessment is enabled &&
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                # task definition has an assessment resources zip file &&
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                # task has a student submission
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                task_definition = task.task_definition
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                unit = task_definition.unit
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                assessment_resources_path = task_definition.task_assessment_resources
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                unless  unit.assessment_enabled &&
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                        task_definition.assessment_enabled &&
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                        task_definition.has_task_assessment_resources? &&
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                        (task.has_new_files? || task.has_done_file?)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

                  puts "ERROR: Assessment is no longer configured for overseer assessment. Unable to send - OverseerAssessment #{id}"
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                  return { error: "This assessment is no longer setup for automated feedback. Automated feedback is turned off at either the unit or task level, or the task does not have the scripts needed to automate assessment." }
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                unless File.exist? submission_zip_file_name
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                  puts "ERROR: Student submission history zip file doesn't exist #{submission_zip_file_name}. Unable to send - OverseerAssessment #{id}"
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

                  return {error: "We no longer have the files associated with this submission. Please test a later submission, or upload your work again." }
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

                docker_image_name_tag = task_definition.docker_image_name_tag || unit.docker_image_name_tag
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                if docker_image_name_tag.nil? || docker_image_name_tag.strip.empty?
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                  puts "ERROR: No docker image name. Unable to send - OverseerAssessment #{id}"
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                  return {error: "This task is not configured to use automated feedback. Please ask your tutor to check the configuration for the task for the associated Docker image."}
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                puts "Sending OverseerAssessment #{id} to message queue"
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                message = {
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                  output_path: output_path,
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                  docker_image_name_tag: docker_image_name_tag,
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                  submission: submission_zip_file_name,
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                  assessment: assessment_resources_path,
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                  timestamp: submission_timestamp,
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

                  task_id: task.id,
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                  overseer_assessment_id: self.id,
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                  zip_file: 1
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                }
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                puts message.inspect
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                begin
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                  sm_instance.clients[:ontrack].publisher.connect_publisher
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                  puts("Sending message to rabbitmq for Overseer Assessment #{id}")
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                  sm_instance.clients[:ontrack].publisher.publish_message(message)
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                  puts("Sent to rabbitmq for Overseer Assessment #{id}")
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                  self.status = :queued
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

                rescue RuntimeError => e
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                  puts "ERROR: OverseerAssessment #{id} failed to send: #{e.inspect}"
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                  self.status = :queue_failed
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

                  return {error: "We are unable to send your submission to the automated feedback service. Please try again later."}
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                ensure
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                  puts "saving... #{self.status}"
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

                  save!
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

                  sm_instance.clients[:ontrack].publisher.disconnect_publisher
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                puts "********* - end perform assessment"
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                if assessment_comments.count == 0
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                  result = add_assessment_comment()
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

                  result = assessment_comments.last
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

                  result.update created_at: Time.zone.now
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

                  result
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

                {
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

                  comment: result,
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

                  error: nil
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

                }
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

            
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

              def update_from_output()
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

                # Update the overseer assessment status
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

                self.status = :done
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

                yaml_path = "#{output_path}/output.yaml"
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

            
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

                if File.exist? yaml_path
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

                  yaml_file = YAML.load_file(yaml_path).with_indifferent_access
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
            

            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

                  comment_txt = ''
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                  if !yaml_file['build_message'].nil? && !yaml_file['build_message'].strip.empty?
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

                    comment_txt += yaml_file['build_message']
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

                  if !yaml_file['run_message'].nil? && !yaml_file['run_message'].strip.empty?
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                    comment_txt += "\n\n" unless comment_txt.empty?
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                    comment_txt += yaml_file['run_message']
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                  if comment_txt.present?
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

                    update_assessment_comment(comment_txt)
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

                    puts 'YAML file doesn\'t contain field `build_message` or `run_message`'
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                  new_status = nil
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

                  if yaml_file['new_status'].present?
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

                    new_status = TaskStatus.status_for_name(yaml_file['new_status'])
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                    self.result_task_status = new_status ? new_status.status_key : task.status
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

                    puts 'YAML file doesn\'t contain field `new_status`'
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

                    self.result_task_status = task.status
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

            
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

                  if task.ready_for_feedback? && new_status.present?
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

                    task.update task_status: new_status
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

                  puts "File #{yaml_path} doesn't exist"
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                  self.result_task_status = task.status
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                puts ERROR: e
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

              ensure
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

                self.save!
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

            
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

              def delete_associated_files
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
            

            

                FileUtils.rm_rf output_path
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      269.

    app/models/overseer_image.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    13 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 13 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            
            

            

            class OverseerImage < ApplicationRecord
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
            

            

              # Callbacks - methods called are private
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

              before_destroy :can_destroy?

    10. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

            class Project < ApplicationRecord
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

              include ApplicationHelper
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

              include LogHelper
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

              include DbHelpers
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

              belongs_to :unit, optional: false
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

              belongs_to :user, optional: false
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

              belongs_to :campus, optional: true
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

              # has_one :user, through: :student
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

              has_many :tasks, dependent: :destroy # Destroying a project will also nuke all of its tasks
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

              has_many :group_memberships, dependent: :destroy
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

              has_many :groups, -> { where('group_memberships.active = :value', value: true) }, through: :group_memberships
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

              has_many :task_engagements, through: :tasks
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

              has_many :comments, through: :tasks
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

              has_many :tutorial_enrolments, dependent: :destroy
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

              has_many :learning_outcome_task_links, through: :tasks
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

              # Callbacks - methods called are private
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

              before_destroy :can_destroy?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

              validates :grade_rationale, length: { maximum: 4095, allow_blank: true }
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

              validate :tutorial_enrolment_same_campus, if: :will_save_change_to_enrolled?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

              after_update :check_withdraw_from_groups, if: :saved_change_to_enrolled?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

              # Permissions around project data
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

              def self.permissions
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                # What can students do with projects?
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                student_role_permissions = [
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                  :get,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                  :make_submission,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                  :get_submission,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                  :change
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                ]
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                # What can tutors do with projects?
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                tutor_role_permissions = [
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                  :get,
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                  :trigger_week_end,
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                  :change_tutorial,
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                  :make_submission,
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

                  :get_submission,
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                  :change,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                  :assess,
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

                  :change_campus
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

                ]
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

                # What can convenors do with projects?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

                convenor_role_permissions = [
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

                ]
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

                # What can nil users do with projects?
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

                nil_role_permissions = [
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

                ]
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

                # Return permissions hash
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                {
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                  student: student_role_permissions,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

                  tutor: tutor_role_permissions,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                  nil: nil_role_permissions
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

                }
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

              def role_for(user)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                user_role(user)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

              # Get all of the projects for the indicated user - with or without inactive units
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

              def self.for_user(user, include_inactive)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                # Limit to enrolled units... for this user
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                result = where(enrolled: true).where('projects.user_id = :user_id', user_id: user.id)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                # Return the result if we include inactive units...
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                return result if include_inactive
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

                # Otherwise link in units and only get active units
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                result.joins(:unit).where('units.active = TRUE')
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

              # Used to adjust the change tutorial permission in units that do not
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

              # allow students to change tutorials
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

              def specific_permission_hash(role, perm_hash, _other)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                result = perm_hash[role] unless perm_hash.nil?
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                if result && role == :student && unit.allow_student_change_tutorial
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                  result << :change_tutorial
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                result
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

              def enrol_in(tutorial)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

                # Check if multiple enrolments changing to a single enrolment - due to no stream.
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

                # No need to delete if only 1, as that would be updated as well.
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

                if tutorial_enrolments.count > 1 && tutorial.tutorial_stream.nil?
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

                  # So remove current enrolments
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial_enrolments.delete_all()
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_enrolment = matching_enrolment(tutorial)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

                if tutorial_enrolment.nil?
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial_enrolment = TutorialEnrolment.new
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial_enrolment.tutorial = tutorial
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial_enrolment.project = self
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

                  # Add this enrolment to aid and check project validation
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial_enrolments << tutorial_enrolment
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial_enrolment.save!
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

                  # add after save to ensure valid tutorial_enrolments
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                  self.tutorial_enrolments << tutorial_enrolment
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

                else # there is an existing enrolment...
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial_enrolment.tutorial = tutorial
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                  tutorial_enrolment.update!(tutorial_id: tutorial.id)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_enrolment
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

              def enrolled_in?(tutorial)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_enrolments.select{|e| e.tutorial_id == tutorial.id}.count > 0 || tutorial_enrolments.where(tutorial_id: tutorial.id).count > 0
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

              # Find enrolment in same tutorial stream
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

              def matching_enrolment(tutorial)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_enrolments.
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                  joins(:tutorial).
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                  where('tutorials.tutorial_stream_id = :sid OR tutorials.tutorial_stream_id IS NULL OR :sid IS NULL', sid: tutorial.tutorial_stream_id).
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                  first
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

              # Check tutorial membership if there is a campus change
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

              def tutorial_enrolment_same_campus
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                return unless enrolled && campus_id.present? && will_save_change_to_campus_id?
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                if tutorial_enrolments.joins(:tutorial).where('tutorials.campus_id <> :cid', cid: campus_id).count > 0
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

                  errors.add(:campus, "does not match with tutorial enrolments.")
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

              def log_details
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                "#{id} - #{student.name} (#{student.username}) #{unit.code}"
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

              def task_outcome_alignments
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                learning_outcome_task_links
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

              # All "discuss" and "demonstrate" become complete
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

              def trigger_week_end(by_user)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                discuss_and_demonstrate_tasks.each { |task| task.trigger_transition(trigger: 'complete', by_user: by_user, bulk: true, quality: task.quality_pts) }
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

              def student
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                user
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

              def tutors_and_tutorial
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                current_tutor = nil
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                first_tutor = true
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_enrolments.
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                  joins(tutorial: {unit_role: :user}).
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                  order('tutor').
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                  select("tutorials.abbreviation as tutorial_abbr, #{db_concat('users.first_name', "' '", 'users.last_name')} as tutor").
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

                  map do |t|
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                    result = "#{t.tutor == current_tutor ? '' : "#{first_tutor ? '' : ') '}#{t.tutor} ("}#{t.tutorial_abbr}"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                    current_tutor = t.tutor
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                    first_tutor = false
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                    result
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                  end.join(' ') + ( !first_tutor ? ')' : '')
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

              def tutorial_enrolment_for_stream(tutorial_stream)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_enrolments.
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                  joins(:tutorial).
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                  where('tutorials.tutorial_stream_id = :sid OR tutorials.tutorial_stream_id IS NULL', sid: (tutorial_stream.present? ? tutorial_stream.id : nil)).
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                  first
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

              def tutorial_for_stream(tutorial_stream)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

                enrolment = tutorial_enrolment_for_stream(tutorial_stream)
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                enrolment.tutorial unless enrolment.nil?
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

              def tutorial_for(task_definition)
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                tutorial_for_stream(task_definition.tutorial_stream) unless task_definition.nil?
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

              def tutor_for(task_definition)
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                tutorial = tutorial_for(task_definition)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                (tutorial.present? and tutorial.tutor.present?) ? tutorial.tutor : main_convenor_user
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

              def main_convenor_user
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                unit.main_convenor_user
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

              def user_role(user)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

                if user == student then :student
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

                elsif user.nil? then nil
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

                elsif unit.tutors.where(id: user.id).count != 0 then :tutor
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                else nil
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

              def active?
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

                unit.active
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
            

            

              # Get a string representation of the Target Grade
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

              def target_grade_desc
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

                case target_grade
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                when 1
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

                  'Credit'
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                when 2
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                  'Distinction'
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                when 3
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

                  'High Distinction'
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

                  'Pass'
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

              def reference_date
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                if application_reference_date > unit.end_date
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

                  unit.end_date
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

                else
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                  application_reference_date
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

              def task_details_for_shallow_serializer(user)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

                tasks
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

                  .joins(:task_status)
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

                  .joins("LEFT JOIN task_comments ON task_comments.task_id = tasks.id AND (task_comments.type IS NULL OR task_comments.type <> 'TaskStatusComment')")
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                  .joins("LEFT JOIN comments_read_receipts crr ON crr.task_comment_id = task_comments.id AND crr.user_id = #{user.id}")
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

                  .select(
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

                    'SUM(case when crr.user_id is null AND NOT task_comments.id is null then 1 else 0 end) as number_unread', 'project_id', 'tasks.id as id',
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                    'task_definition_id', 'task_statuses.id as status_id',
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                    'completion_date', 'times_assessed', 'submission_date', 'tasks.grade as grade', 'quality_pts', 'include_in_portfolio', 'grade'
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                  )
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                  .group(
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                    'task_statuses.id', 'tasks.project_id', 'tasks.id', 'task_definition_id', 'status_id',
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                    'completion_date', 'times_assessed', 'submission_date', 'grade', 'quality_pts',
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

                    'include_in_portfolio', 'grade'
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

                  )
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

                  .map do |r|
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

                    t = Task.find(r.id)
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
            

            

                    {
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

                      id: r.id,
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

                      status: TaskStatus.id_to_key(r.status_id),
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

                      task_definition_id: r.task_definition_id,
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

                      include_in_portfolio: r.include_in_portfolio,
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
            

            

                      pct_similar: t.pct_similar,
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
            

            

                      similar_to_count: t.similar_to_count,
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

                      similar_to_dismissed_count: t.similar_to_dismissed_count,
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

                      times_assessed: r.times_assessed,
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
            

            

                      grade: r.grade,
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
            

            

                      quality_pts: r.quality_pts,
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

                      num_new_comments: r.number_unread,
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

                      extensions: t.extensions,
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

                      due_date: t.due_date
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

                    }
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
            

            

            
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
            

            

              def assigned_tasks
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

                tasks.joins(:task_definition).where('task_definitions.target_grade <= :target', target: target_grade)
