              # Returns authentication of the user
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

              def token_for_text?(a_token)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

                self.auth_tokens.each do |token|
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

                  if a_token == token.authentication_token
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

                      return token
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                return nil
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

              ###
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

              # Schema
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

              ###
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

              # Model associations
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

              belongs_to  :role, optional: false # Foreign Key
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

              has_many    :unit_roles, dependent: :destroy
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

              has_many    :projects
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

              has_many    :auth_tokens
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

              has_one     :webcal, dependent: :destroy
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

              # Model validations/constraints
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

              validates :first_name,  presence: true
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

              validates :last_name,   presence: true
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

              validates :role_id,     presence: true
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

              validates :username,    presence: true, uniqueness: { case_sensitive: false }
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

              validates :email,       presence: true, uniqueness: { case_sensitive: false }, format: {with: /\A([^@\s]+)@((?:[-a-z0-9]+\.)+[a-z]{2,})\z/i}
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

              validates :student_id,  uniqueness: true, allow_nil: true
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

              # Queries
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

              scope :tutors,    -> { joins(:role).where('roles.id = :tutor_role or roles.id = :convenor_role or roles.id = :admin_role', tutor_role: Role.tutor_id, convenor_role: Role.convenor_id, admin_role: Role.admin_id) }
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

              scope :convenors, -> { joins(:role).where('roles.id = :convenor_role or roles.id = :admin_role', convenor_role: Role.convenor_id, admin_role: Role.admin_id) }
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

              scope :admins,    -> { joins(:role).where('roles.id = :admin_role', admin_role: Role.admin_id) }
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

              def self.teaching(unit)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                User.joins(:unit_roles).where('unit_roles.unit_id = :unit_id and ( unit_roles.role_id = :tutor_role_id or unit_roles.role_id = :convenor_role_id) ', unit_id: unit.id, tutor_role_id: Role.tutor_id, convenor_role_id: Role.convenor_id)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

              # def username=(name)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

              #   # strip S or s from start of ids in the form S1234567 or S123456X
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

              #   truncate_s_match = (name =~ /^[Ss]\d{6,10}([Xx]|\d)$/)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

              #   name[0] = '' if !truncate_s_match.nil? && truncate_s_match.zero?
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

              #   self[:username] = name.downcase
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

              # end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

              def has_student_capability?
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                true
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

              def has_tutor_capability?
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                role_id == Role.tutor_id || has_convenor_capability?
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

              def has_convenor_capability?
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                role_id == Role.convenor_id || has_admin_capability?
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

              def has_admin_capability?
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                role_id == Role.admin_id
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

              def self.get_change_role_perm_fn
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                lambda do |role, perm_hash, other|
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                  from_role = other[0]
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                  to_role = other[1]
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                  (chg_roles = perm_hash[:change_role]) &&
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                    (role_hash = chg_roles[role]) &&
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                    (from_role_hash = role_hash[from_role]) &&
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                    from_role_hash[to_role]
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

              # Permissions around user data
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

              def self.permissions
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                # Change role permissons:
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

                #   who can change a Doubtfire user's role?
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                change_role_permissions = {
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                  # The current_user's role is an Administrator
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

                  admin: {
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                    # User being assigned is an admin?
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                    #   An admin current_user can demote them to either a student, tutor or convenor
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

                    admin: {     student: [ :demote_user  ],
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

                                 tutor: [ :demote_user ],
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                                 convenor: [ :demote_user ] },
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                    # User being assigned is a convenor?
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                    #   An admin current_user can demote them to student or tutor
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                    #   An admin current_user can promote them to an admin
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                    convenor: {  student: [ :demote_user  ],
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                                 tutor: [ :demote_user  ],
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

                                 admin: [ :promote_user ] },
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

                    # User being assigned is a tutor?
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

                    #   An admin current_user can demote them to a student
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                    #   An admin current_user can promote them to a convenor or admin
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

                    tutor: {     student: [ :demote_user  ],
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

                                 convenor: [ :promote_user ],
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

                                 admin: [ :promote_user ] },
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

                    # User being assigned is a student?
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

                    #   An admin current_user can promote them to a tutor, convenor or admin
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

                    student: {   tutor: [ :promote_user ],
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                                 convenor: [ :promote_user ],
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

                                 admin: [ :promote_user ] },
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

                    # User being assigned has no role?
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

                    #   An admin current_user can create user to any role
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

                    nil: {       student: [ :create_user  ],
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

                                 tutor: [ :create_user  ],
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

                                 convenor: [ :create_user ],
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

                                 admin: [ :create_user  ] }
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

                  },
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
            

            

                  # The current_user's role is a Convenor
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

                  convenor: {
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                    # User being assigned is an tutor?
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

                    #   A convenor current_user can demote them to a student
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                    tutor: {     student: [ :demote_user  ] },
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

                    # User being assigned is an student?
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                    #   A convenor current_user can promote them to a student
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                    student: {   tutor: [ :promote_user ] },
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                    # User being assigned has no role?
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

                    #   A convenor current_user can create a user to either a student or tutor role
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                    nil: {       student: [ :create_user  ],
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

                                 tutor: [ :create_user  ] }
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

                  }
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

                }
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

                # What can admins do with users?
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                admin_role_permissions = [
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

                  :create_user,
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

                  :upload_csv,
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                  :list_users,
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

                  :download_system_csv,
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

                  :download_unit_csv,
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

                  :update_user,
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

                  :create_unit,
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

                  :act_tutor,
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

                  :admin_units,
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

                  :admin_users,
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                  :convene_units,
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

                  :download_stats,
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

                  :handle_teaching_period,
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                  :handle_campuses,
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                  :handle_activity_types,
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                  :get_teaching_periods,
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                  :rollover,
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                  :admin_overseer,
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                  :use_overseer
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

                ]
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

            
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

                # What can convenors do with users?
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

                convenor_role_permissions = [
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
            

            

                  :promote_user,
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

                  :list_users,
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

                  :create_user,
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

                  :update_user,
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

                  :demote_user,
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
            

            

                  :upload_csv,
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
            

            

                  :download_unit_csv,
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

                  :create_unit,
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

                  :act_tutor,
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
            

            

                  :convene_units,
          
      276.

                  :download_stats,
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

                  :get_teaching_periods,
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

                  :use_overseer
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

                ]
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

            
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
            

            

                # What can tutors do with users?
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

                tutor_role_permissions = [
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
            

            

                  :act_tutor,
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
            

            

                  :download_unit_csv,
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

                  :get_teaching_periods
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

                ]
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

            
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
            

            

                # What can students do with users?
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
            

            

                student_role_permissions = [
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
            

            

                  :get_teaching_periods
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
            

            

            
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

                ]
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
            

            

            
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
            

            

                # Return the permissions hash
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
            

            

                {
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            
            

            

                  change_role: change_role_permissions,
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
            

            

                  admin: admin_role_permissions,
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
            

            

                  convenor: convenor_role_permissions,
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            
            

            

                  tutor: tutor_role_permissions,
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
            

            

                  student: student_role_permissions
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            
            

            

                }
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
            

            

            
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            
            

            

              def self.default
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            
            

            

                user = new
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
            

            

                institution_email_domain = Doubtfire::Application.config.institution[:email_domain]
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
            

            

                user.username   = 'username'
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
            

            

                user.first_name = 'First'
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
            

            

                user.last_name  = 'Last'
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
            

            

                user.email      = "XXXXXXX@#{institution_email_domain}"
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
            

            

                user.nickname   = 'Nickname'
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312.

              def role_id=(new_role_id)

                new_role = Role.find(new_role_id)

                new_role = Role.student if new_role.nil?

      326.

                fail_if_in_unit_role = [] if new_role == Role.admin || new_role == Role.convenor
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            
            

            

            
          
      328.

                for check_role in fail_if_in_unit_role do

      330.

              def self.export_to_csv

                exportables = csv_columns.map { |col| col == 'role' ? 'role_id' : col }

                CSV.generate do |row|

                    # rename encrypted_password key to just password and role_id key to just role

                    if attribute == 'encrypted_password'
          
      371.

                      'password'

                    elsif attribute == 'role_id'
          
      373.

              def self.import_from_csv(current_user, file)

                success = []

    407. 
            
            

            

            
          
      408.

                CSV.parse(data,
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            
            

            

                          headers: true,
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            
            

            

                          header_converters: [->(i) { i.nil? ? '' : i }, :downcase, ->(hdr) { hdr.strip.tr(' ', '_') unless hdr.nil? } ],
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            
            

            

                          converters: [->(body) { body.encode!('UTF-8', 'binary', invalid: :replace, undef: :replace, replace: '') unless body.nil? }]).each do |row|
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            
            

            

                  next if row[0] =~ /(email)|(username)/

                    last_name = row['last_name']
          
      424.

                    username = row['username']
          
      425.

                    nickname = row['nickname']
          
      426. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    426. 
            
            

            

                    role = row['role']
          
      427. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    427. 
            
            

            

            
          
      428. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    428. 
            
            

            

                    pass_checks = true
          
      429. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    429.

                      next unless row[col].nil? || row[col].empty?

      434. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    434.

                    new_role = Role.with_name(role)

                    username = username.downcase # ensure that find by username uses lowercase
          
      445.

                      user = User.find_or_create_by(username: username) do |new_user|

                        new_user.first_name         = first_name.titleize

    464. 
            
            

            

                        new_user.encrypted_password = BCrypt::Password.create('password')
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            
            

            

            
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            
            

            

                      # will not be persisted initially as password cannot be blank - so can check
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            
            

            

                      # which were created using this - will persist changes imported
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            
            

            

                      if user.new_record?

                        user.save!
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            
            

            

                        success << { row: row, message: "Added user #{username} as #{role}." }
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            
            

            

                      else

    473. 
            
            

            

                        ignored << { row: row, message: "User #{username} already existed." }
          
      474.

                      end

                    end

                  rescue Exception => e

      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      480.

      481.

                {

                  success: success,

              end

            end

            class Webcal < ApplicationRecord

              # Array of valid units by which task reminders (alarms) can be set.

              def self.valid_time_units

              def reminder?

                reminder_time.present? && reminder_unit.present?

              # Retrieves `TaskDefinition`s that must be included in the generation of this webcal.

    26. 
            
            

            

              # Eager loads all associations used by the `Webcal.to_ical` method.
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

              # Currently executes in just 1 SQL query!
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

              def task_definitions
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                TaskDefinition
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                  .joins(:unit, unit: :projects)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                  .eager_load(:tasks)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                  .includes(:unit, :tasks, unit: :projects)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                  .where(
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                    projects: { user_id: user_id },
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                    units: { active: true }
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                  )
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                  .where.not(
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                    units: { id: WebcalUnitExclusion.where(webcal_id: id).select(:unit_id) } # exclude :webcal_unit_exclusions
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                  )
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                  .where('tasks.project_id is null or tasks.project_id = projects.id')   # eager_load only :tasks of :projects
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                  .where('? BETWEEN units.start_date AND units.end_date', Time.zone.now) # Current units
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                  .where('task_definitions.target_grade <= projects.target_grade')       # only :tasks of the targeted_grade or lower
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

              # Retrieves the event name for the specified task definition in the calendar.
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

              # Valid values for `variant` are,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

              #   - 'start' retrieves the name for the _start event_
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

              #   - 'end' (default) retrieves the name for the _end event_
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

              def event_name_for_task_definition(task_def, variant = 'end')
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                name = "#{task_def.unit.code}: #{task_def.abbreviation}: #{task_def.name}"
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                case variant
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                  when 'start' then "Start: #{name}"
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                  when 'end'   then (include_start_dates ? "End: #{name}" : name)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

              # Generates a single `Icalendar::Calendar` object from this `Webcal` including calendar events for the specified
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

              # collection of `TaskDefinition`s.
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

              # The `unit` property of each `TaskDefinition` is accessed; ensure it is included to prevent N+1 selects. For example,
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

              #   to_ical_with_task_definitions(
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

              #     TaskDefinition
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

              #       .joins(:unit)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

              #       .includes(:unit)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

              #   )
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

              def to_ical(task_defs = task_definitions)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                ical = Icalendar::Calendar.new
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

                ical.publish
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                ical.prodid = Doubtfire::Application.config.institution[:product_name]
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

                # Add iCalendar events for the specified definition.
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                task_defs.each do |td|
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

                  # Notes:
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                  # - Start and end dates of events are equal because the calendar event is expected to be an "all-day" event.
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

                  # - iCalendar clients identify events across syncs by their UID property, which is currently the task definition
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

                  #   ID prefixed with S- or E- based on whether it is a start or end event.
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                  ev_date_format = '%Y%m%d'
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                  ev_reminders = reminder?
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                  ev_reminder_trigger = "-PT#{reminder_time}#{reminder_unit}"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                  # Add event for start date, if the user opted in.
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                  if include_start_dates
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                    ical.event do |ev|
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

                      ev.uid = "S-#{td.id}"
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                      ev.summary = event_name_for_task_definition(td, 'start')
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                      ev.status = 'CONFIRMED'
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                      ev.dtstart = ev.dtend = Icalendar::Values::Date.new(td.start_date.strftime(ev_date_format))
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                      Webcal.add_metadata_to_ical_event(ev, td)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                      if ev_reminders
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                        ev.alarm do |a|
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                          a.action = 'DISPLAY'
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                          a.description = ev.summary
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                          a.trigger = ev_reminder_trigger
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

                  # Add event for target/extended date.
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

                  ical.event do |ev|
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

                    ev.uid = "E-#{td.id}"
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

                    ev.summary = event_name_for_task_definition(td, 'end')
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

                    ev.status = 'CONFIRMED'
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

                    ev.dtstart = ev.dtend = Icalendar::Values::Date.new(Webcal.end_date_for_task_definition(td).strftime(ev_date_format))
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

                    Webcal.add_metadata_to_ical_event(ev, td)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

                    if ev_reminders
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

                      ev.alarm do |a|
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

                        a.action = 'DISPLAY'
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                        a.description = ev.summary
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                        a.trigger = ev_reminder_trigger
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                # Specify refresh interval.
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                refresh_interval = Icalendar::Values::Duration.new('1D')
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                # https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/openspecs/exchange_server_protocols/ms-oxcical/1fc7b244-ecd1-4d28-ac0c-2bb4df855a1f
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                ical.append_custom_property('X-PUBLISHED-TTL', refresh_interval)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                # https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7986#section-5.7
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                ical.append_custom_property('REFRESH-INTERVAL', refresh_interval)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                ical
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

              # Returns the target/extended date for the specified task definition.
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

              def self.end_date_for_task_definition(task_def)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                  ev_date = task_def.target_date
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                  ev_date += (task_def.tasks.first.extensions * 7).day if task_def.tasks.present?
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                  return ev_date
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

              # Hydrates `Icalendar::Event`s with Doutbfire-specific metadata.
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

              def self.add_metadata_to_ical_event(event, task_def)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                event.append_custom_property('X-DOUBTFIRE-UNIT', task_def.unit.id.to_s)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                event.append_custom_property('X-DOUBTFIRE-TASK', task_def.id.to_s)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

              # Retrieves Doubtfire-specific metadata from `Icalendar::Event`s previously hydrated via `add_metadata_to_ical_event`.
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

              #
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

              def self.get_metadata_for_ical_event(event)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                return {
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                  unit_id: event.custom_property('X-DOUBTFIRE-UNIT').first.to_i,
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                  task_definition_id: event.custom_property('X-DOUBTFIRE-TASK').first.to_i,
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                }
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      164.

    lib/assets/ontrack_receive_action.rb

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2.

            require 'yaml'

            def receive(_subscriber_instance, channel, _results_publisher, delivery_info, _properties, params)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

              params = JSON.parse(params)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

              logger.info "Receiving update for overseer assessment: #{params}"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

              logger.info "Acknowledge delivery of message"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

              # Params must contain:
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

              # overseer assessment id
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

              if params['overseer_assessment_id'].nil?
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                logger.error 'PARAM `overseer_assessment_id` is required'
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                channel.reject(delivery_info.delivery_tag)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                return
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

              overseer_assessment_id = params['overseer_assessment_id']
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

              overseer_assessment = OverseerAssessment.find(overseer_assessment_id)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

              unless overseer_assessment.present?
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                logger.error "No overseer_assessment found for id: #{overseer_assessment_id}"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                channel.reject(delivery_info.delivery_tag)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                return
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

              channel.ack(delivery_info.delivery_tag)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

              overseer_assessment.update_from_output
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

            rescue StandardError => e
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

              logger.error e.inspect
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

            ensure
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

              overseer_assessment.save! unless overseer_assessment.nil?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      36.

    lib/helpers/database_populator.rb

            if Rails.env.development?

              require 'faker'

            end
          
      4.

            require 'bcrypt'

            require 'json'

            require_all 'lib/helpers'
          
      7.

      8.

            #
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

            # This class populates data in the database
          
      10.
